subject: ğŸ”¥ What's new in Replit: auth, new tutorials, and more!
snippet: They say April showers bring May flowersâ€”April was a busy month at Replit & May is shaping up to be a superbloom. Friday, May 2, 2025 Hey it's Matt! They say April showers bring May flowersâ€”
content:
They say April showers bring May flowersâ€”April was a busy month at Replit & May 
is shaping up to be a superbloom.



 <https://replit.com>



Friday, May 2, 2025


Hey it's Matt!

 They say April showers bring May flowersâ€”April was a busy month at Replit & 
May is shaping up to be a superbloom. ğŸ’

April's product updates include a mix of new features and polish:


 * Replit Auth: add users and login, instantly
 * A new homepage: designed to spark inspiration & innovation
 * Agent improvements: better checkpoints & performance improvements
 * Replit improvements: improved secrets syncing, polish, & bug fixes

and much, much more!




ğŸ‘¤ Add users & login with just a click



Replit Auth is now out for all. 

What's auth? Well, it's a way to add users / login to your apps. Typically, 
auth is a hard problem... That's why there are entire industries dedicated to 
it.

Replit Auth is backed by our services, so we handle things like password / 
email reset, storing user data, security, and more.

Get started by adding the following to your Agent prompt: Add Replit Auth. 


âœ… Improved checkpoints



 Checkpoints just got a whole lot better: simpler messages, a checkpoint 
preview, and a new design.

We're making it easier to understand where you've been so you can move forward 
and build better features.


ğŸ  New home, who dis?



We've rolled out our new homepage and it's pretty neat.

 Head to a logged-out replit.com <https://replit.com> to give it a look.


ğŸ“Œ Other new features


 * Better secrets sync: We've improved secrets syncing between development and 
deployments, so you'll never have to worry about mismatched values
 * Mobile app onboarding: If you haven't tried Replit Mobile 
<https://replit.com/mobile>, we've got a new onboarding and improved design to 
help you ship on the go! 
 * Better file uploads: You'll notice our file drag-n-drop is better than 
ever. Upload some images to your project to see it in action
 * Teams improvements: For our B2B users, we've got new features rolling out 
for all teams, including better invites, advanced privacy settings, and more. 
If you're interested in Replit at work, checkit out <https://replit.com/teams>
 * Performance improvements: Backend performance and reliability improvements, 
bringing faster Agent responses. We also matchintegrations 
<https://docs.replit.com/replitai/integrations> better in existing chats with 
Agent

ğŸ“š Cheat Sheet


You can get quite a bit from Replit with only natural language...

...BUT I've created a cheat sheet for our power users that goes over 
everythingâ€”from Replit basics to extras & advanced tips. You can find the high 
res version by clicking the image below ğŸ‘‡

 <https://docs.replit.com/additional-resources/cheat-sheet>

ğŸ“¹ Videos & tutorials


 I've started dropping some shorter bite-sized videos for learning about 
Replit features. I'm shipping them on theReplit YouTube 
<https://www.youtube.com/@replit> as well as my own channel 
<https://www.youtube.com/@mattpalmer>.

 You can find two of the latest (Checkpoints + Secrets) below. 




 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iLOxO1FBZls>

 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qE_2Z8ReyWI>



5 Skills for Vibe Coding: Learn my 5 skills for good outcomes in vibe coding:


 * Procedural Thinking: Planning your app like a product manager and engineer
 * Leveraging Frameworks: Knowing which tools to use and asking the AI for help
 * Building in Checkpoints: Making incremental progress and using AI snapshots
 * Debugging Methodically: Systematically finding and fixing errors with AI 
assistance
 * Mastering Context: Giving AI the right information (and only the right 
information)

 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ctPkWNM2Ak>

If you've already built an amazing app with Replit, share it with us 
<https://forms.gle/sAqiKGTvXYa9Hjzc9> to be featured in an upcoming email.


ğŸ”® Looking Ahead


The ways we build continue to change. We're at the forefront of a shifting 
landscapeâ€”it can be both exciting and daunting.

 Every day I wake up excited to keep creating, learning, & sharing.

I genuinely hope it can help you make sense of all these new tools and ideas. 
Let's keep creating apps and moving forward.

Until next time,

Matt <https://x.com/mattppal> @ Replit

 <https://x.com/mattppal>

 <https://twitter.com/Replit> <https://www.linkedin.com/company/repl-it>  
<https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgoJjdR6-7AMu9fDitb6nVw> 
<https://www.instagram.com/repl.it/?hl=en>



Sent by Replit

1001 E Hillsdale Blvd, Suite 400, Foster City, CA 94404 


Unsubscribe here 
<https://links.replit.com/s/u/CfzOzW3BTA2OY-AWdqxF5NtBsfzfyBGLUBImu6vtwx9eqZnHL8refF5X-QSc8kQFp92lr0wG8nXvMlNIQx3HCkHBO2YBaMlghkGAKYeU0hztsJVgfLl8YvejspYMrzW3gTEgSAXXKopU1rY_QzCsaaWFI1gphnMr-3Yajz7jp3vk6l0l-PZ5QYCcaupRLWmy6TlWFujcY0ZvEUGl/H8Gdqr7OxIc9cqp9uwYp8KYz3BXb9GTu/8>

subject: Start building Lovable apps with full stack features in < 5 minutes
snippet: Hi, I noticed that you never connected any of your lovable apps to a backend (Supabase) which I highly recommend. With Supabase, your Lovable app is enabled to... Save data - so that information you
content:
Lovable Logo

Hi,

I noticed that you never connected any of your lovable apps to a backend (Supabase) which I highly recommend.

With Supabase, your Lovable app is enabled to...

* Save data - so that information you add in your app doesn't disappear when you refresh
* Allow login - so that people can sign up to your app and have their own profile
* Connect APIs - like OpenAI for AI functionality or Stripe to collect Payments

These are the simple steps:

* Create a Supabase account & project here ( https://supabase.com/dashboard/sign-up )
* Build your app on Lovable and click "Connect Supabase" ( https://lovable.dev/ )

Start Building Now ( https://lovable.dev )

Best,
The Lovable Team

Lovable Logo

Turn ideas into Lovable products at
Lovable.dev ( https://lovable.dev )

Unsubscribe ( http://track.customer.io/unsubscribe/dgTmjgoAAK2XqAOsl6gDAZaQue6QqQrSJAHhw7Zj4w== )

content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!!

Kindly go through the trailing mail. Interested students working in this
domain can grab the opportunity. Students willing to participate are
requested to show their interest by filling out the form on the
below-mentioned link on or before 05.05.2025.

Register Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5CThsX1ck3NjQ9SntMLQrl1PNzugGgKtQby2KEwXw8RsZTA/viewform?usp=sharing>

Feel free to contact on radhikapatel.it@charusat.ac.in for any queries
regarding the same.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <mehak.chhabra@apna.co>
Date: Wed, Apr 30, 2025 at 4:10â€¯PM
Subject: FinArva AI Hackathon 2025 | â‚¹10L+ Rewards + Direct Interviews (CTC
up to â‚¹25 LPA)
To:

Dear Placement Cell Team,

I'm reaching out from Apnaâ€™s Early Career Engagements team to share an
opportunity that may be relevant for your students and recent graduates.

FinArva AI Hackathon 2025
<https://apna.co/contests/finarva-ai-hackathon-2025?utm_source=Website&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=TPO_30_PI&utm_id=TPOIT>,
hosted by GroMo and powered by AWS, is now accepting applications. This
national-level hackathon invites participants to build AI-led solutions for
real challenges in financial product distribution, particularly for
Bharatâ€™s next billion users.

Selected participants will go through mentorship, collaborate with peers,
and present their ideas to industry leaders. Top teams will also be
considered for direct interviews with GroMo (CTC up to â‚¹25 LPA).



   -

   Direct Interviews with CTC up to INR 25 LPA
   -

   Open to students, recent graduates, and professionals with an interest
   in AI, product, and fintech
   -

   No commercial involvement at any stage â€“ participation is free
   -

   Winners receive prizes worth â‚¹10,00,000+
   -

   In-person 3-day build sprint in Gurgaon (accommodation and meals covered)

Important Dates:

   -

   Phase 1: Virtual submission deadline â€“ 19th May 2025
   -

   Phase 2: In-person hackathon in Gurgaon â€“ 30th May to 1st June 2025

Weâ€™d appreciate it if you could circulate this among your students. Please
also feel free to extend this to your alumni networkâ€”individuals or
early-stage professionals who may be interested in building with AI or
exploring fintech problems.

Let me know if you'd like to discuss anything about the event.
Warm regards,
Mehak
Team apna

--

subject: Fwd: Information on "the Certificate Course in R Programming" at CHARUSAT for wider publicity
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty Members, We are excited to announce the launch of the Certificate Course on R Programming for Beginners, organized by the Department of Mathematical Sciences, PD Patel
content:
Dear Students and Faculty Members,

We are excited to announce the launch of the *Certificate Course on R
Programming for Beginners*, organized by the Department of Mathematical
Sciences, P. D. Patel Institute of Applied Sciences, Faculty of Science,
CHARUSAT.

ğŸ“… *Course Duration:* May 26 to June 30, 2025
ğŸ–¥ï¸ *Mode:* Online Live Sessions + Recorded Lectures
ğŸ“œ *Certification Provided*
â³ *Limited Seats Available*
ğŸ—“ï¸ *Last Date for Registration:* 10 May, 2025
ğŸ¯ *Who Can Join?*
Undergraduate students from Science, Engineering, Humanities with basic
knowledge of Mathematics and Statistics; professionals in Analytics, Data
Science, and Simulation domains.

*What You'll Learn:*

   -

   R syntax, data types, and functions
   -

   Data manipulation and visualization using *dplyr* and *ggplot2*
   -

   Real-world data analysis and statistical computations
   -

   Writing custom functions, using loops and conditional statements
   -

   Importing/exporting data, creating plots and graphs
   -

   Installing and using R packages

ğŸ’° *Course Fee:* INR 500/- only

ğŸ”— *Register Here: *Registration Form <https://forms.gle/F7NGWSDVXDy7HaHx6>
ğŸ’³ *Payment Link: *PAY NOW <https://rzp.io/rzp/KGF1Ein>

ğŸ“§ For queries, contact:
*Dr. Vyomesh Nandurbarkar*
Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematical Sciences
âœ‰ï¸ Email: vyomeshpn.maths@charusat.ac.in

Contact Number: +91-9428696968

ğŸŒ Visit: CHARUSAT Website <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>

Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to gain hands-on experience in one of the most
widely used languages in data science.
*Register today and take a confident step toward your data-driven future!*

-- 
With Thanks & Regards
Dean, Faculty of Science,
Charotar University of Science and Technology,
CHARUSAT campus, Changa-388421, Gujarat, India
web: www.charusat.ac.in
Ph.02697265197;  7600414303

--

subject: Fwd: CHARUSAT - IIIM and FoH - Invitation to participate in "French For All" â€“ 2 Credit (30 Hours) offline Certificate Course (12th â€“ 30th May, 2025)
snippet: Dear Students, salutations du jour (Greetings for the day!!), Kindly find the brochure of learning French in a trailing mail, interested one's can learn. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From
content:
Dear Students,

salutations du jour (Greetings for the day!!),

Kindly find the brochure of learning French in a trailing mail, interested
one's can learn.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, May 1, 2025 at 3:28â€¯PM
Subject: CHARUSAT - IIIM and FoH - Invitation to participate in "French For
All" â€“ 2 Credit (30 Hours) offline Certificate Course (12th â€“ 30th May,
2025)
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear CHARUSAT family,


Greetings!


In the interconnected and competitive world today, language skills are not
just an added advantage - they are essential. Among the global languages,
*French* stands out as a key that opens doors to new cultures, careers, and
international opportunities. In the evolving job market, versatility is
valued, and proficiency in foreign languages serves as a significant
differentiator.


*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM)* and *Faculty of
Humanities* (FoH), CHARUSAT are jointly organizing *30 hrs offline 2 Credit
Certificate Course* titled *"French For All"*, scheduled from 12th May to
30th May, 2025. This program is specially designed for *beginners and
language enthusiasts* who wish to experience the richness and utility of
the French language through engaging, hands-on sessions.


The detailed brochure is attached for your kind reference. We encourage you
to share this opportunity with interested students, colleagues, and anyone
eager to expand their linguistic and professional horizons.


For any further queries, please feel free to contact: *Dr. Vikas Raval* â€“
+91 94293 56638 or 5135 (intercom).


We look forward to your active participation and support.


Thank you.


With regards,

*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*





Accredited Grade â€œA+â€ by NAAC


www.charusat.ac.in


-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

snippet: Notification settings DIT Sem 1 and 4 | HSS New announcement Dear Students, This is to inform you that the University Practical Examination for the course HS111.03 D HUMAN VALUES AND ETHICS is
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s?email%3Dd24dit079@charusat.edu.in&Email=d24dit079@charusat.edu.in>
DIT Sem 1 and 4 | HSS  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NjIzMjYyNjQzNjYx?email%3Dd24dit079@charusat.edu.in&Email=d24dit079@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Dear Students,

This is to inform you that the University Practical Examination for the  
course HS111.03 D HUMAN VALUES AND ETHICS  is scheduled on 3rd May, 2025.

The exam components and schedule are as follows:
Quiz - 30 marks (In class)
GD - 20 marks
Viva - 20 marks

9:10 to 12:30 -   GD & VIVA (Groups 1 to 7)
12:30 to 1:30  -  Quiz (All students)
1:30 to 4:00  -   GD & VIVA (Groups 8 to 11)

On the day of your practical exam you are required to:

    - Bring your Hall Ticket & I-card
    - Wear formal attire
    - Come prepared for Quiz, Viva and GD
    - Groups 1 to 7 report sharp at 9:10 AM
    - Groups 8 to 11 report sharp at 12:20 PM


Please refer to the attached question bank, GD Topics and syllabus for the  
preparation of the practical exam. The venue for the exam is 124 and 125.

Feel free to call and communicate in case of any queries related to the  
exam, topics, or question bank. It is advisable that you thoroughly refer  
to the study material shared with you earlier.

All the best for your university exam!

With regards,

subject: Join â€œFrench For Allâ€ â€“ 30-Hour Offline French Language Training at CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, Looking to add an exciting and valuable skill to your profile? The Faculty of Humanities (FoH), CHARUSAT is offering a 30-hour offline interactive training program titled â€œFrench For All
content:
Dear Students,

Looking to add an exciting and valuable skill to your profile?

The *Faculty of Humanities (FoH), CHARUSAT* is offering a *30-hour offline
interactive training program* titled *â€œFrench For Allâ€*, from *12th May to
30th May, 2025â€”* specially designed for *beginners and language enthusiasts*
.

In todayâ€™s global job market, just having technical or academic skills is
no longer enough. *Learning a foreign language like French can give you a
competitive edge*, opening up new career opportunities, international
exposure, and cultural insights.

This is your chance to:

âœ”ï¸ â£Explore the beauty and power of the French language
âœ”ï¸ Gain a strong foundation in Listening, Speaking, Reading, and Writing
(LSRW)
âœ”ï¸ Learn in a fun, engaging classroom environment

 *The detailed brochure is attached for your reference.*
ğŸ“ For queries, contact *Dr. Vikas Raval* at +91 94293 56638

Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to enhance your future â€” *enroll now and say
â€œBonjourâ€ to new possibilities!*


Best wishes,
Faculty of Humanities
CHARUSAT


*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: Inspiration time - what are people building with Lovable?
snippet: Hey, People are building some cool things with Lovable, I'd love to share a few I like that are built fully or partially with Lovable: Wiktok - TikTok for Wikipedia pages BluePrintA - Simplify
content:
Lovable Logo

Hey,

People are building some cool things with Lovable, I'd love to share a few I like that are built fully or partially with Lovable:

* Wiktok ( https://wiktok.gptengineer.run/ ) - TikTok for Wikipedia pages
* BluePrintA ( https://blueprinta.xyz/ ) - Simplify Product Development
* Dummy Forms ( https://dummyforms.lovable.app/ ) - Easily create forms
* Wildcard AI (YC) ( https://wild-card.ai/ ) - Intelligent tool selection API for AI agents
* Aneta ( https://www.aneta.so/ ) - AI agents to supercharge HR and workplace engagement
* RaiseFlow ( https://www.raiseflow.io/ ) - An investor CRM

You should build something great yourself, go to Lovable ( https://lovable.dev/ ).

Start Building Now ( https://lovable.dev )

Best,
The Lovable Team

Lovable Logo

Turn ideas into Lovable products at
Lovable.dev ( https://lovable.dev )

subject: Fwd: A Unique Opportunity to Sharpen Your Students' Coding Mindset
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Apr 30, 2025 at 3:16 PM Subject: Fwd: A Unique Opportunity to Sharpen Your Students
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Apr 30, 2025 at 3:16â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: A Unique Opportunity to Sharpen Your Students' Coding Mindset
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Ma'am/Sir,

We are excited to offer your students an invaluable learning experience!

TalentSprint is hosting a free LIVE masterclass with *Asokan Pichai* (aka
Master Shifu) on * May 6, 2025, at 7:00 PM IST.* With 35+ years of
expertise in software development and AI, Asokan has mentored over 30,000
engineers. This masterclass goes beyond teaching code, itâ€™s designed to
help your students develop the mindset of a top-tier developer.

*Hereâ€™s what your students will gain from this session:*

   - *Master key problem-solving strategies* that top developers rely on
   - *Go beyond syntax* to develop a problem-solving mindset that drives
   innovation
   - *Learn how to tackle coding challenges* effectively and with
   confidence

This is a rare opportunity for your students to learn directly from a
Grandmaster in the tech field and gain insights that will set them apart in
their careers. Plus, all participants will receive a * Certificate of
Participation* from TalentSprint.

We encourage you to share this opportunity with your students. This is the
perfect chance for them to build the mindset to tackle tasks with
confidence.

*Registration Link:*
https://zoom.us/webinar/register/9617459014949/WN_LVcIWpxASj2BSa97fxV5QQ

Looking forward to seeing your students join us!

Best regards,
TalentSprint, part of Accenture

If you wish to opt out of all type of emails, click Unsubscribe
<https://mc.talentsprint.com/un/kYdhaMKHuJFMBbjAFdxMcBXaSIfxiZMKKJaFDxPxgcAMVvjJKMSFkJwlBMkjzf>
.
[image: open track]

-- 
*Regards,*

*Sachin Patel*

Technology and Research,Charotar University of Science and
Technology,ACCREDITED WITH "A+" GRADE BY NAAC, GOI*

snippet: Dear Students, Kindly read the instructions carefully and follow the guideline. Thanks & Regards, Akash Patel â€‹Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of
content:
Dear Students,

Kindly read the instructions carefully and follow the guideline.

Thanks & Regards,

Akash Patel
â€‹Assistant Professor,
Department of Information Technology,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
CHARUSAT, Changa.




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: HOD IT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 30 Apr 2025 at 10:43â€¯AM
Subject: 4th Sem and 6th SEM Project evaluation guidelines



Dear Students,

Your work on the project development (*IT-266 Project - I Sem 4 and IT-368
Project III Sem 6*) shall be evaluated based on the following criteria. You
are informed to strictly follow the presentation sequence given below, as
they are evaluation criteria of the project:

*Project Conception *

   - Objectives
   - Plan Components
   - Resource Adherence

*Technical Implementation *

   - Functional Requirements
   - Non-Functional Requirements
   - Industry Practice Adopted

*Problem Solving *

   - Challenges (faced during project development) resolved
   - Innovative solution(s) provided

An example of project conception is given in the attachment.

*Your presentation shall be followed by a demo of your project.*

Thanks,
Parth

--

New assignment

IT265_DAA_Practical_ExamApril_2025_SET_1
Instructions for Using Safe Exam Browser (SEB)
Download SEB File


    - Please download the attached .seb file provided by your instructor.  
This file contains the configuration required for the exam.


Install Safe Exam Browser


    - If you do not have Safe Exam Browser installed on your device,  
download it from the official website and complete the installation.


Open the SEB File


    - After installation, double-click the downloaded .seb file to launch  
Safe Exam Browser with the preconfigured settings.


Start the Exam


    - The Safe Exam Browser will automatically navigate to the exam  
environment. Follow the instructions displayed on the screen to begin your  
test.


Exiting the Browser


    - During the exam, you will not be able to exit the Safe Exam Browser  
without a password.
    - Password to Exit: This will be provided by the faculty at 12:15 PM.  
Ensure you stay logged in and wait for further instructions.


Technical Issues


    - If you encounter any technical issues, immediately inform your faculty  
or support team.

Due Apr 30

subject: Important: Online Session for Elective Subject Introduction
snippet: Dear Students, An online session has been arranged today at 7:00 PM to introduce the elective subjects for your upcoming semester. You have two elective groups, and each group offers multiple subjects.
content:
Dear Students,

An online session has been arranged today at 7:00 PM to introduce the
elective subjects for your upcoming semester.

You have two elective groups, and each group offers multiple subjects. You
are required to select one subject from each group.

This session will provide valuable guidance on the importance and scope of
each subject to help you make an informed decision regarding your choices.

*Join the meeting now
<https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_OTRjOTUwNmMtZWUwOS00M2JlLWFlZDYtOGU4YTY4ODk4MGEy%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%228dbd2884-120c-413b-80b2-1117dd3469a4%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%2271b7b816-967e-472c-bf40-d475a3f149d1%22%7d>*

*Meeting ID: 464 446 228 430 0*

*Passcode: p5bn3U8v*

All students are informed to join before 5 minutes.

It is highly recommended to ensure you choose the subjects best aligned
with your interests and career goals.

-- 
Thanks & Regards,
Akash Patel
Assistant Professor,
Department of Information Technology,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
CHARUSAT, Changa.

--

subject: The Future of Tech Needs You! Cisco Learn-a-Thon
snippet: View online Cisco Networking Academy Logo The Future of Tech Needs You! Join the International Girls in ICT Day Learn-A-Thon! Technology is shaping every industry, creating millions of new job
content:
The Future of Tech Needs You!
Join the International Girls in ICT Day Learn-A-Thon!
Technology is shaping every industry, creating millions of new job opportunitiesâ€”but women are still vastly underrepresented in tech. With only 29.2% of the STEM workforce being female, we cannot afford to leave women behind. Diversity fuels innovation, and closing the gender gap is the only way forward. 

Thatâ€™s why Cisco Networking Academy is launching the International Girls in ICT Day Learn-A-Thonâ€”an opportunity to gain essential tech skills, explore future careers, and take your first step into the world of technology. No matter your background, tech has a place for you! 

Choose from three exciting courses and start learning today: 

Introduction to Cybersecurity â€“ Discover how to protect digital landscapes in todayâ€™s connected world. Enroll now <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGaG7PeT9Vd8Piy4kHatt1S8TxOWR0U07FwGxSSzkQtx20bXh587ogMngSxEaTQC3xE3hMEXQU=>

Introduction to Data Science â€“ Learn how to uncover insights from data and make informed decisions. Enroll now <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGaG7PeT5r9CLjh6IENOP4Hdu4rXTLQuiSXLMcRoBYSpW2ey2SQIy0W7pBO7pkSHKfBdJulUZ8=>

Introduction to Modern AI â€“ Explore the power of artificial intelligence and its role in shaping the future. Enroll now <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGaG7PeT4cp9YRnBnntFXcUL7zcJgww2EYv-XwPD4vhuIAIgJdZmeRXe33xzwekLM76hQyrB9I=>

Donâ€™t miss this chance to gain valuable skills and be part of the next generation of female tech leaders!The future of tech needs your voice, talent, and ideas. Letâ€™s break barriers together!
The future is here. Donâ€™t miss this chance to discover how you can kick-start your career in the exciting world of technology!

subject: Important Instructions for Practical Examination - Lab Cleanliness and Resource Care
snippet: Dear Students, As you prepare for your upcoming practical examinations, I would like to remind you of a few important instructions to ensure a smooth and organized environment for everyone Please
content:
Dear Students,

As you prepare for your upcoming practical examinations, I would like to
remind you of a few important instructions to ensure a smooth and organized
environment for everyone

   1.

   Please arrange the chairs properly after completing your exam.

   2.

   Turn off the PCs and place keyboards and mice neatly on the tables.

   3.

   Kindly throw any garbage (such as rough pages, scrap papers, etc.) into
   the dustbin provided.

   4.

   Make sure the lab and all resources are kept neat and clean for the next
   session.


Your cooperation in maintaining a clean and organized lab is highly
appreciated and reflects a respectful attitude toward shared resources.

Again!! All the very best for your practical examination!
-- 
*Regards,*

*Sachin Patel*



*Department of Information Technology,Devang Patel Institute of Advance
Technology and Research,Charotar University of Science and
Technology,ACCREDITED WITH "A+" GRADE BY NAAC, GOI*

Practical and Viva Examination General Instructions

    - Refer Hitesh Sir Email for Seating Arrangement for the Practical Exam.
    - Timing for the Practical Exam is 9:00 AM to 12:30 PM. and viva  
Examination timing is 9:00 to 4:30 PM.


Practical Examination Guidelines

    -
    -
    : Laptop, charger, practical file (if applicable), stationary, and any  
required software/tools pre-installed.

    -
    The assigned task/problem must be .

    -
    Maintain as applicable.

    -
    After completion, you may be asked to your work to the examiner.



Viva Examination Guidelines

    -
    -
    Be prepared to answer , syllabus topics, and fundamental concepts.

    -
    to the examinerâ€™s questions before answering.

    -
    ; if unsure about an answer, admit it politely rather than guessing.

    -

    -
    Conceptual understanding

    -
    Application of knowledge

    -
    Problem-solving ability

    -
    Communication skills

    -
    Confidence and attitude






Marks will be awarded based on a evaluating multiple aspects  
(understanding, communication, accuracy, depth of knowledge, and  
confidence).


Important Reminders

Thank You.

subject: Fwd: Invitation to Attend a Workshop on â€œModern Frameworks and AI-Powered UIsâ€ at L.J. University Ahmedabad
snippet: Thanks and Regards, RADHIKA H. PATEL Assistant Professor Department of Information Technology DEPSTAR, CHARUSAT, Changa - ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: LJ UNIVERSITY <modern.ai.uis@
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RADHIKA H. PATEL*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Information Technology*
*DEPSTAR,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa*







-

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: LJ UNIVERSITY <modern.ai.uis@ljku.edu.in>
Date: Sat, Apr 26, 2025 at 10:26â€¯AM
Subject: Invitation to Attend a Workshop on â€œModern Frameworks and
AI-Powered UIsâ€ at L.J. University Ahmedabad
To:

*Respected Sir/Madam,*

*Greetings from LJ University !!!*

It gives us immense pleasure to invite you to a two-day hands-on workshop
on â€œ*Modern Frameworks and AI-Powered UIs*â€, organized by the Department of
Computer Engineering, LJ Institute of Engineering and Technology, under the
aegis of Lok Jagruti Kendra (LJK).

The objective of this workshop is to provide a platform for academicians,
industry professionals, and students to gain practical insights into
cutting-edge front-end frameworks and AI-driven UI design. Sessions will be
led by domain experts from reputed institutes and industries, and will
focus on real-world applications and interactive coding.

We would be honoured by your esteemed presence and support at the workshop.

        Â·    *Date:* *10th â€“ 11th May 2025*

   - *Venue: L.J Campus, Sarkhej, Ahmedabad â€“ 382210, Gujarat*


   - *Website: *
   *https://ljku.edu.in/university-news/modern-frameworks-ai-powereduis-62*
   <https://ljku.edu.in/university-news/modern-frameworks-ai-powereduis-62>


*Please find the detailed brochure **(with revised registration fees)*
*attached
for your kind perusal. Kindly circulate it among your staff and students.
We look forward to your confirmation and hope to welcome you to our campus.*



Note: Certificates will be provided to participants upon a successful
completion of the workshop.

For any further information, feel free to contact:

   - Prof. Rajat Dave: rajat.dave@ljku.edu.in | +91-9898178877
   - Prof. Hiral Patel: hiral.patel@ljku.edu.in | +91-9904317117


*Warm regards,*



*Dr. Prexa Parikh Director (I/C)LJ Institute of Engineering and
TechnologyAhmedabad*

--

subject: University Practical/Viva Examinations Detailed Schedule
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the University Practical/Viva Examinations for 4th Semester B.Tech. IT is scheduled to commence shortly. Please find the detailed examination schedule attached
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that the University Practical/Viva Examinations for
4th Semester B.Tech. IT is scheduled to commence shortly. Please find the
detailed examination schedule attached to this email.

   -

   *Practical Examinations* will be conducted from *9:00 AM to 12:00 PM*
   for all students.
   -

   *Viva-Voce* will be conducted *in parallel during the practical sessions*
   and will continue till completion.

You are all requested to *strictly adhere to the University Rules and
Regulations* throughout the examination process.

For any queries or clarifications, kindly *contact me directly* to avoid
any confusion or miscommunication.
-- 

*Thanks & Regards,*

*Prof. Hitesh Makwana*

*Assistant Professor*

*Department of Information Technology*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (Depstar)*

*Charotar University of Science and Technology (Charusat)*

*Mo: 8460752501*

--

subject: Introducing Lovable 2.0 â€“ now smarter, multiplayer, and more secure
snippet: Introducing Lovable 2.0 â€” now smarter, multiplayer, and more secure Hey, Lovable 2.0 is finally here! Today, we're making Lovable smarter with a chat mode agent, adding multiplayer so you can
content:
Lovable Logo

*****************************************
Introducing Lovable 2.0 â€”
now smarter, multiplayer, and more secure
*****************************************

Hey, Lovable 2.0 is finally here!

Today, weâ€™re making Lovable smarter with a chat mode agent, adding multiplayer so you can collaborate with your team, enhancing security with project scanning, and more.

See announcement video here ( https://youtu.be/xDwR1_vrIg8?si=iTNR4pBJ8bHpKI9J ).

This is everything that's new:

----------------
New Brand and UI
----------------

New Brand and UI

We've made ourselves more lovable. Our new brand, and cleaner UI, is as bold as you feel when turning your dreams to reality.

Go to Lovable.dev ( https://lovable.dev/ ) to see it for yourself.

-----------
Multiplayer
-----------

Multiplayer

Each subscription is now connected to a workspace.

Users with a Pro subscription have personal workspaces. You can still invite up to 2 people to individual projects. Collaborators on a project use project owner credits.

Users with a Teams subscription can have up to 20 users in their workspace. Owners & admins can freely invite & remove users and manage projects. Editors can only make edits to existing projects. All users in a workspace share the connected credit pool.

Perfect for friends, startups, and smaller enterprise teams collaborating on the same app or wanting centralized billing.

This feature is being
rolled out in stages â€“ if you donâ€™t see it yet, itâ€™s on the way!

---------------
Chat Mode Agent
---------------

Chat Mode Agent

Our new chat mode agent is 10x smarter and doesn't make edits to the code. This is perfect for asking questions, planning your project, and debugging. This mode is agentic, meaning it can reason across multiple steps and decide when to search files, inspect logs, query the database, and more.

-------------
Security Scan
-------------

Security Scan

Easily surface security vulnerabilities in your app before publishing with Lovableâ€™s new Security Scan feature. You will find the results of the scan in the publish dialog for Supabase-enabled apps.

This is just the start of many things we'll do in the coming months to make vibe coding more secure.

---------------
Pricing updates
---------------

Weâ€™ve simplified our pricing into two clear options: a Pro plan,
with flexible tiers starting at $25/month, and a Teams plan, starting at $30/month for teams that need shared workspaces.

See our pricing page ( lovable.dev/pricing ) for all details.

------------------------
Join the Lovable 2.0 AMA
------------------------

â€‹Weâ€™re hosting a live AMA to wrap up the launch, answer your questions, and share whatâ€™s next.

â€‹Anton (Lovable founder) and the team will be there â€” tune in and ask us anything!

â€‹Weâ€™re crowdsourcing questions on X â€” drop yours in the thread once we post it and join us live for answers.

Sign up here: https://lu.ma/xkuww33l

--------------------------
We're just getting started
--------------------------

This is a new chapter for Lovable. In the coming months, weâ€™re making the product more powerful, secure, and intuitive.

Check out the blog post: https://lovable.dev/blog/lovable-2-0

Thank you all for your support.

Start Building Now ( https://lovable.dev )

Best,
The Lovable Team

Lovable Logo

Turn ideas into Lovable products at
Lovable.dev ( https://lovable.dev )

Unsubscribe ( http://track.customer.io/unsubscribe/dgTmjgoDAK2XqAOsl6gDAZZpX450xquuFBK9eC2Qiw== )

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: UNICEF YuWaah <yuwaah@mail.unicef.org>

Subject: UNICEF YuWaah Fellowship Opportunity with National Youth Climate
Consortium
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Fellowship Opportunity of upto INR 1 Lakh for Climate Projects

Dear Dr. Amit Ganatra,

Hope you are having a great week!

We are thrilled to announce that applications are now open for the *Climate
Champion of Young India Fellowship*
<https://s45nj.mjt.>,
the flagship program under the *National Youth Climate Consortium (NYCC)*,
led by *Bring Back Green Foundation* and supported by *YuWaah at UNICEF
India.*

*About the Fellowship*

The Climate Champion of Young India Fellowship is a 6-month leadership and
grant fellowship designed to empower youth working on local climate action.
Selected fellows will receive:

   - Up to* INR 1 Lakh* to implement or expand grassroots climate projects
   - Training, mentorship, and technical support from leading experts
   - National and international representation opportunities including *COP30,
   LCOY India 2025*, etc.
   - Peer learning and communication support
   - Continued integration into Indiaâ€™s growing climate advocacy ecosystem

*Who Can Apply?*

   - Young individuals between *18 and 29 years old*
   - Based in India and actively working on or planning to launch a local
   climate or environmental project in one or more of the following thematic
   areas : Research, Innovation, Mobilization and/or Community Engagement and
   Awareness.
   - Able to commit to a *6-month fellowship* and collaborate with local
   stakeholders
   - Youth leaders from underrepresented regions, marginalized identities,
   and grassroots backgrounds are strongly encouraged to apply

*How to Apply?*

To apply, please follow these steps:

subject: Fwd: Live Online Session on â€˜Getting Jobs and Internships in AI (Artificial Intelligence)â€™ for the Students of Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research.
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Rohit from Bolt IoT <trainings@boltiot.com> Date: Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 11:38 AM Subject: Live Online Session on 'Getting Jobs and Internships in
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Rohit from Bolt IoT <trainings@boltiot.com>
Date: Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 11:38â€¯AM
Subject: Live Online Session on â€˜Getting Jobs and Internships in AI
(Artificial Intelligence)â€™ for the Students of Devang Patel Institute of
Advance Technology and Research.
To:


Explore career paths in AI and get actionable advice on securing
internships and job offers in this cutting-edge domain.

Dear,



Past week we organised a session on Artificial Intelligence, we received a
tremendous response from students across India joining us. Thank you for
sharing our recent initiatives with your students. Your support has played
a vital role in helping many of them gain valuable insights and direction
as they navigate their academic and professional paths. To further support
their journey, this week, we are organising a live session on 'Getting Jobs
and Internships in the domain of AI (Artificial Intelligence)'. There is *NO
FEE* for this session, but *seats are limited* and will be allotted on
a *first-come,
first-served basis*.

subject: We Are Live! Join Cisco's International Girls in ICT Day!
snippet: View online Cisco Networking Academy Logo We Are Live! We're thrilled to announce that International Girls in ICT Day presented by Cisco, is now live! Discover how to harness your unique strengths,
content:
We Are Live!
We're thrilled to announce that International Girls in ICT Day presented by Cisco, is now live! Discover how to harness your unique strengths, build bridges where divides exist, and inspire others to follow in your footsteps. 

Don't miss this chance toÂ learn fromÂ top Cisco leaders.Â Together, let's shape a digital future that's inclusive for all!
Remember to share yourÂ favorite moments. Engage with us by using the official event hashtag #FindYourself.

subject: Fwd: EC-Council | Hackerverse Capture the Flag (CTF) challenge - Invites Students for Monthly Cyber-competitions
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings for the day!!! Grab the opportunity, More details are in trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Priteshkumar Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Grab the opportunity, More details are in trailing mail.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Priteshkumar Prajapati <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Apr 23, 2025 at 10:32â€¯AM
Subject: EC-Council | Hackerverse Capture the Flag (CTF) challenge -
Invites Students for Monthly Cyber-competitions
To: Madhav Ajwalia <madhavajwalia.it@charusat.ac.in>, Pritesh Prajapati <
priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>, Martin Parmar <
martinparmar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, sneha padhiar <
snehapadhiar.ce@charusat.ac.in>, AKSHITA KADAM <
akshitakadam.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Pinal Hansora <
pinalhansora.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Shital Sharma <
shitalsharma.dit@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Jayswal <
hardikjayswal.it@charusat.ac.in>, Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in>,
Ashish Katira <ashishkatira.dit@charusat.ac.in>, Khushi Patel <
khushipatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Kajal Parmar <kajalparmar.dce@charusat.ac.in>,
Sachi Joshi <sachijoshi.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Naina Parmar <
nainaparmar.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, Bansari Patel <
bansaripatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Parth Shah <parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

Please share the email below with your students to get benefit as an
EC-Council Academia Partner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear students,

*EC-Council has launched Hackerverse **Capture the Flag (CTF) challenge**.
Find the details below and register using your CHARUSAT email id for the
same.*

Hackerverse is a global cybersecurity competition ecosystem designed by
EC-Council to support and advance the cybersecurity community worldwide.
Rooted in EC-Councilâ€™s longstanding commitment to empowering cybersecurity
professionals worldwide, Hackerverse provides a competitive arena for
individuals across all proficiency levels to demonstrate their skills
through rigorous, gamified *Capture the Flag (CTF) challenges*.

Hackerverse was officially unveiled at Hacker Halted 2022, EC-Councilâ€™s
annual cybersecurity conference that unites ethical hackers, security
professionals, and industry leaders from across the globe. A platform for
thought leadership and technical exchange, Hacker Halted serves as a
convergence point for innovation, research, and discourse on emerging cyber
threats and defense strategies.

Hackerverse has helped EC-Council to broaden its impact, transitioning from
localized cybersecurity competitions to a truly global competitive
platform. *Through Hackerverse CTF, a year-long, free-to-enter Capture the
Flag (CTF) challenge on Hackerverse, cybersecurity professionals and
enthusiasts from around the world can now test their skills on a much
larger stage. *The competition features a dynamic scoring system that
rewards participants for speed and precision, reflecting the high-stakes
nature of cybersecurity. *With over $100,000 in prizes, it represents
EC-Councilâ€™s commitment to supporting and rewarding cybersecurity talent
worldwide.*

As cyber threats continue to evolve, Hackerverse remains a dynamic proving
ground, ensuring that the next generation of cybersecurity professionals is
prepared to meet the challenges of an increasingly complex digital
landscape.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
Subject: EC-Council | Invites Students for Monthly Cybercompetitions
To: priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in <priteshprajapati.it@charusat.ac.in>


*What is the Hackerverse?*

â€œThe Hackerverseâ€ (hacker universe) is an environment consisting of
gamified cybersecurity knowledge and skills-based competitions designed to
support individuals, whether they are aspiring, new, or seasoned
professionals in the cybersecurity field.

[image: A screenshot of a video game AI-generated content may be incorrect.]

*The Hackerverse CTF*

The Hackerverse CTF is a free, global Capture the Flag competition offering
monthly rotating challenges across the latest topics and skills valued by
industry and employers. Participants may compete monthly for cash and
in-kind prizes awarded to players achieving top scores on the leaderboard.

[image: A diagram of a business strategy AI-generated content may be
incorrect.]

*Who Can Register?*

The Hackerverse CTF is open to players ages 14 and up. Any student or
professional who wishes to participate may do so.

[image: A blurry image of a computer AI-generated content may be incorrect.]

*Grow and Validate Your Cybersecurity Skills*

Participants within the Hackerverse CTF will be able to showcase their
skills and talent, completing a series of carefully designed questions that
get progressively more difficult. Players will compete against a global
network for prizes and top rankings. The primary focus of the Hackerverse
CTF is to get more participants engaged in cybersecurity competitions,
leading to increased knowledge and skill development.

<https://hackerverse.com/>

[image: A red background with white text and white text AI-generated
content may be incorrect.]

*Your Cybersecurity Skill Development Starts Now!*

Registration for the Hackerverse CTF is currently open. To find out more
about the Hackerverse cybersecurity competitions and engagements, please
visit www.hackerverse.com.

<https://hackerverse.com/>

subject: NetAcad Student Newsletter â€“ April 2025
snippet: View online Hello NetAcad Student, Welcome to your latest quarterly newsletter, packed with important updates, exciting new learning options, great events, and more. Read on! Important Updates Action
content:
Hello OM,
 

The new experience at NetAcad.com is live! We're excited to see that many classes are already underway. This milestone marks a significant step in our mission to power an inclusive future for all. In our ongoing spirit of innovation, we will continue to add more teaching and learning features, courses, and resources.


To our partners and educators: thank you for your continued support, patience, and trust in Cisco Networking Academy. We highly value your collaboration and look forward to the positive impact we will continue to make together in our communities around the world.


Scroll down for tips on the new NetAcad.com platform, new courses, orientation learning collections, and more. We are also thrilled to unveil a whole new page dedicated to careers promoting current job opportunities with new employment partners like Indeed, the #1 job search platform (currently U.S. only).


And with Cybersecurity Awareness Month fast-approaching, you can get ready by checking out the first in our 10-part virtual series (see the Events section)! We also have a campaign 
Sourcebook forthcoming, so be on the lookout for this awesome guide that will help you and your instructors promote opportunities and attract even more students. Finally, don't forget to remind your instructors to encourage their students to check out the new Find yourself in the future and Women Rock-IT special events coming soon.
First report released
The AI-Enabled ICT Workforce Consortium - led by Cisco with 8 leading tech companies plus key advisors - releases first report. Looks at effects of AI on top 50 ICT jobs, with actionable training recommendations to enable an AI-powered workforce.
Update to legal agreements - August 26
Stay tuned for updates to The Cisco Networking Academy membership guide, Terms and Conditions, privacy documents, and Packet Tracer Distribution Terms on August 26.
End-of-life: Continuing Education (CE) credits
Cisco Networking Academy is exiting the Cisco Continuing Education (CE) Credits program. Learn more <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYiEFMuoYk8-hSfvd30I4laUJcXSZOlXPjyf8o3qmwTxNiOS_OZtTppJY3xacLNIRoJ4=>
Journey to Convergence
Visit Convergence Hub
Keep track of everything to do with Convergence of SkillsForAll.com and NetAcad.com on the Convergence Hub.
FINAL CHECKLIST
Convergence this month!
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
1. Downtime: 72 hours
Both NetAcad.com and SkillsForAll.com will be down for 72 hours. Start and end times depend on your location.

Take note <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYa9fYmFMt97GVzmgIDm1Nb2NeasOxSwPqLziE6rpM2sEb6_Wmv8Y8AIJvbQJtr9ZheY=>
2.Â Maintain downtime access
to Cisco Packet Tracer during planned downtime, especially for the 72 hours both sites will be down for convergence.

Prepare <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYRu0VN7gpimIShVWFHpXxNNzwT2gSkdur39unuaz_ceHSSnO2ZRIZWFH5XTRSZk9ACg=>
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
3. Quick Start Guide
Download the new NetAcad.com Quick Start Guide for Instructors.
Download <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYUy1Ahc9JPfO5SCMooUbh1mZN8iqotEl_TO5rgiZEpUl3Lzwt2zT2ESxyPzGVesLqyw=>
4. Understand simplified roles
See how the number of roles are simplifying in theÂ new NetAcad.com.Â 
View <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYVrm77ogs_8cVCCsAu64-h0UtU7EvOtwl1dSQryVfzq1zdsNuOLfGR_L6lQyghP73k8=>
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
5. Start course customizations now

IPD Course Customization recordings cover how to migrate course customizations to the new NetAcad.com.Â And you don't need to wait for convergence! Start building content now then add to courses from August 26.Â 
Replay IPD <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYV1fOx3I5B51RTh3Va1qv9V5L4nCfaz6xp5rrmBS_OwExnzzFuX6pftHjyL332Xsd9U=>
6.Â Are you ready for the newÂ NetAcad.com?
Three August IPD sessions continue preparing educators for convergence:Â 
1) Top 5 Instructor Tasks
2) Academy Management
3) Are you Ready â€“ convergence overview.Â 
Register IPD <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYV1fOx3I5B51RTh3Va1qv9V5L4nCfaz6xp5rrmBS_OwExnzzFuX6pftHjyL332Xsd9U=>
Course Updates
Course translations
Arabic and Ukrainian Networking course translations are now available as instructor-led.
CCNP end-of-life
End-of-life date has been set for Cisco Networking Academy CCNP Enterprise: Core Networking (ENCOR) and CCNP Enterprise: Advanced Routing and Services (ENARSI).
Good News
International Day of the World's Indigenous People
August 8 marks International Day of the World's Indigenous People. Learn how our Cisco Networking Academy community elevates through education with these great success stories.Â 

Julio Lezcano, Panama <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYeqS_UUz2fGKzspjJ3S1Bf-5Hu14kk5un7wMeyo6EWUAfoaFlwfB-idLs6arR59SEm8=>Â  IÂ  Dr Gabriella Arellano, United States <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYdhFhaeSnT7rLAYkBxVm_G70w12gtlAKgPcH3RT2PJi5DnVfcOaprgxMsCkyTbZKvNM=>Â  IÂ  Tully, Australia <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYs6K9OXMkWA3dKPy8fuGFPYo2cYOTN7ZtlV5r9y0JltjBt_mCAamZu04UN39e7-SBLQ=>
Find yourself in the future
Grow student numbers by promoting these quarterly virtual broadcasts as studentsÂ navigate their own career path. Students learn latest technology trends, presented by Cisco experts. Coming soon: educator sourcebook.

 <[[${FacebookLink}]]>
 <[[${YoutubeLink}]]>
 <[[${TwitterLink}]]>
 <[[${LinkedInLink}]]>
 
Join our feeds to be the first to hear about updates and opportunities, and share your own innovative ideas.

Please do not reply to this email.

 To unsubscribe, log in to Cisco Networking Academy <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYZgcYm1aiDvk50lLWRHEusCPJBKPmqzbfyTVuMB6u-WhCVWi7TFDqK6uoBDBJ9tmrCc=>, click on your name (top right corner), and update your Notification and Email Preferences. If you are no longer part of the Networking Academy program and need to have your account deleted, log in, go to help, and submit a request for deletion. If you do not have a Cisco Networking Academy account, unsubscribe here <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYZkTxSy4CrcWw9b_QbXcb4lZE55ox6TYjGqvnxoq0ml6zcGds0kLoPvgqsfIaK3xobc=>.

Cisco.com <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYRS38lJiLWjGLHDtFsqp7lFbmYS_zF7W15x7QCvBAT83EaVGwybT7_F9lMMqeOWW1X0=> | Privacy Statement <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYZ0uCKHbKHpVHTdNuc5oWVYips6tcNY1ArzlZdC7Umgma8qhXlBVYeoM_R5tL6ML9q8=> | Trademarks <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZ_XdaYQmaIzk8BI6m4-OCy_thneItTLSlT2A_H1S9KXBpwMLjM6OyxhsLw9D_urn45mR4BWM=>

subject: Fwd: Summer Internship Opportunities for Your Students
snippet: Best Regards, Chintal Upendra Raval, Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research Charotar University of Science and Technology
content:
Best Regards,
Chintal Upendra Raval,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Information Technology
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
Charotar University of Science and Technology
*Email*: chintalraval.dit@charusat.ac.in
*Phone*: 9016156565
*Intercom Extension*: 5114




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <hr@novusark.com>
Date: Mon, Apr 21, 2025 at 5:23â€¯PM
Subject: Summer Internship Opportunities for Your Students
To: <tnp@charusat.ac.in>


Greetings from Novus Ark!

We are excited to inform you about "Summer internship" opportunities at
our company, tailored for students eager to gain hands-on experience in
tech and marketing domains.

Available Positions:
* Frontend Development Intern
* Backend Development Intern
* Flutter Development Intern
* UI/UX Design Intern
* Graphic Designer Intern
* Social Media Marketing Intern
* Sales and Marketing Intern

Key Details:
Location: Sama-Savli, Vadodara, Gujarat
Stipend: â‚¹3,000â€“â‚¹5,000 per month (based on skills)
Additional Incentives: For marketing, sales, interns based on
performance.
Duration: 1â€“2 months

Eligibility:
* Any students pursuing Diploma, B.Tech, M.Tech, BBA, MBA, or Commerce
degrees.
* Candidates available for Full-Time/Part-Time (in-office) internships.
* Immediate joiners preferred.
* Candidates based in Vadodara or nearby areas.
* Relevant skills and a strong interest in their chosen field.

This internship offers students an excellent platform to enhance their
practical knowledge, work on real-world projects, and receive
mentorship.

We would be happy to collaborate with your esteemed institution to
onboard talented students. Please let us know if we can schedule a
discussion.

Contact Us:
Convenient time to contact: Between 9AM to 6PM
Tanishq Jadav, HR Executive: 87991 45517
Neha Shah, Co-Founder: 79848 72439

There is an attached google form link with this mail given below,
interested students can fill the form given below, feel free to ask any
queries on given contact number.
https://forms.gle/wmACbUQsj4e9miwj8



Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Tanishq Jadav
HR Executive
Novus Ark



--

subject: Boost Your Career: CCNA Insights, Cisco Talos Strategies & Empowering Women in ICT
snippet: View online Explore the transformative power of the CCNA certification with our new video, "A Glimpse at Your Future with the CCNA." Discover how becoming a Cisco Certified Network Associate
content:
Explore the transformative power of the CCNA certification with our new video, "A Glimpse at Your Future with the CCNA." Discover how becoming a Cisco Certified Network Associate can elevate your career, hear inspiring success stories, and gain expert exam preparation tipsâ€”all at your convenience. Don't miss this opportunity to enhance your networking career. Click below to start watching now!
Hear From Cisco Top Female Leaders
In honour of International Girls in ICT Day (April 24, 2025), Cisco is hosting an event focused on empowering girls of every background. This year's theme is celebrating the power of standing out to drive change.
Discover Cisco Talos
There are so many niche fields within cybersecurity, each dedicated to protecting infrastructures across the globe - and you're going to get the chance to explore several of them with our speaker Joe Marshall, Senior Security Strategist at Cisco Talos.

 <[[${FacebookLink}]]>
 <[[${YoutubeLink}]]>
 <[[${TwitterLink}]]>
 <[[${LinkedInLink}]]>
 
Join our feeds to be the first to hear about updates and opportunities, and share your own innovative ideas.

subject: Using these 5 Lovable features will change the way you build products
snippet: Hey, Are you one of the Lovable pro users that leverage all of Lovable's capabilities? We have built in 5 powerful features to create more value for you: Connect to Supabase to add login, connect
content:
Lovable Logo

Hey,

Are you one of the Lovable pro users that leverage all of Lovable's capabilities?

We have built in 5 powerful features to create more value for you:

* Connect to Supabase ( https://docs.lovable.dev/integrations/supabase ) to add login, connect external APIs, store data, and more.
* Connect to GitHub ( https://docs.lovable.dev/integrations/git-integration ) to combine prompting and coding in any code editor with Lovable's 2-way Github sync
* Visual edits ( https://docs.lovable.dev/features/precision-edit ) to make small changes in Lovable's figma-like editor by clicking the "edit" toggle below the chat
* Publish on a custom domain ( https://docs.lovable.dev/tips-tricks/custom-domain ) that you buy and connect to directly in Lovable. Just click "Publish" --> "Connect Custom Domain" in the top right of our editor
* Add input to "Custom Knowledge" ( https://docs.lovable.dev/features/knowledge ) under the "plus" icon in chat, to define info you want the AI to consider at all times, like API documentation or visual guidelines.

This 15-minute Lovable tutorial by a fantastic Youtuber outlines them all:
image ( https://youtu.be/Y1mZ7EzTFwo?si=6fxbS-v5G3bjl8rN )

Start Building Now ( https://lovable.dev )

Best,
Anton Osika

Lovable Logo

Turn ideas into Lovable products at
Lovable.dev ( https://lovable.dev )

Unsubscribe ( http://track.customer.io/unsubscribe/dgTmjgoAAK2XqAOsl6gDAZY_6XtUaqi-X60PuEuHQw== )

subject: Join Us for International Girls in ICT Day â€“ Register Now!
snippet: Unlocking nature's secrets: How AI and data save wildlife and benefit humanity View online Cisco Networking Academy Logo Empowering Girls of Every Background International Girls in ICT Day is fast
content:
Empowering Girls of Every Background
International Girls in ICT Day is fast approaching, and we invite you to be part of this global movement dedicated to bridging the gender gap in technology.Â 







On April 24, CiscoÂ female leaders are sharing their personal journeys, mentorship experiences, and insights on the future of tech: including AI & inclusivity.
Why Should You Attend
- Engage with Visionary Speakers: Listen to inspiring talks from global female leaders in tech, who will share their unique journeys, challenges, and triumphs in the industry.

 
	- Gain Insights into the Future of Tech: Discover the latest trends in technology, including discussions on AI, cybersecurity, and inclusivity, providing you with valuable knowledge to stay ahead in the field.

 
	- Empower Yourself and Others: Be part of a transformative experience that not only empowers you but also contributes to closing the gender gap in tech, creating a more inclusive and diverse future for all.
Meet the Speakers
Jacqueline Guichelaar
Senior Vice-President Cisco Customer Experience APJC
Adele Trombetta
Senior Vice-President Cisco Customer Experience EMEA
Let's unite to bridge the gap and create a tech future where everyone belongs!

subject: ğŸ”¥ User Showcase: Fresh apps built on Replit
snippet: Replit users have been cooking ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ³ Get inspired with the latest and greatest apps, built with Agent by users like you. Hola it's Matt ğŸ‘‹ They say April showers bring May flowers, but amazing apps
content:
Replit users have been cooking ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ³ Get inspired with the latest and greatest 
apps, built with Agent by users like you.


â€Š
â€Š



Hola it's Matt ğŸ‘‹

They say April showers bring May flowers, but amazing apps are blooming 
year-round on Replit.

 This user showcase features a space-saving PDF app, a podcast discovery 
platform, a game giving Wordle a run for its money, and a tool for learning 
your next great vocab word.

Let's jump in âœ¨





Already have a great project? Submit your app to be featured.

Submit your app <https://forms.gle/4SHuSUZRhQShEZVv7> 


PodNudge: <https://podnudge.com/> Finding your favorite podcast shouldn't be 
so hard. PodNudge is a lightweight discovery engine for podcasts.

PodNudge connects with Podcast Index API for comprehensive show data and 
integrates with Plink for easy show and episode linking.

From the creator: "This was my first Replit Agent built app. This was before 
the term vibe code was penned on the Internet. I felt the vibes instantly when 
iterating with Replit Agent on PodNudge. It opened my eyes to see the 
possibilities of going from problem (need better podcast search independent of 
platform) to idea (build a lightweight podcast search) to prototype."

 Thanks Mark <https://x.com/MarkMathson>!



LowCarbPDF:  <https://lowcarbpdf.com/>Compressing PDFs shouldn't be 
complicated. This simple tool helps you reduce PDF file sizes instantlyâ€”no 
persistent storage means your sensitive documents stay secure. And though we 
love carbs, we appreciate the diet pun!

 Just upload, compress, and download. That's it. Perfect for businesses that 
regularly need to shrink PDFs for uploads to systems with tight file size 
limits.

From the creator: "[I built it] specifically for one client who has trouble 
uploading PDFs to a health insurance company. I also created LowCarbTIFF.com 
for this client, as they receive weird TIFF files and used to have to hire me 
to reduce their size about once a week. Now, they just use the site!"

 Thanks Eric <>!



WordLeap: <https://wordleap.co.uk/> As someone who's constantly trying to 
expand my vocabulary, I know the struggle of retaining new words.

 WordLeap tackles this with a sleek flashcard system that helps you create, 
manage, and study customized decks of word pairs. Track your progress, review 
learned words, and build your vocabulary systematically.

 For this creator, Agent unlocked the ability to build a full-featured 
application with integrated Stripe payments, database functionality, cloud 
storage, OpenAI capabilities, caching, GitHub-synced development and production 
environments, and efficient state management through hooks.



Wiblet: <https://wiblet.com/> There's something addictive about word games 
that challenge both your vocabulary and quick thinking.

 Wiblet puts your word skills to the test with a 4x4 grid of letters where you 
tap to form words against the clock. Compete on daily leaderboards, track your 
progress, and push yourself to find longer words under pressureâ€”all playable 
instantly from any device without downloads.

From the creator: "Wiblet empowers users to challenge their vocabulary and 
reflexes in a fun, fast-paced way. It offers a quick mental workout that's easy 
to pick up but hard to put down."

Thanks Joe <https://www.linkedin.com/in/joemurfin/>!


ğŸ”® What's next


 There's something in the airâ€”these vibe-coded <https://youtu.be/5OWurmg41tI> 
apps are getting better and better. Today, anyone can ship their ideas.

If you've never built before, now is the best time to get started.

 Jump in and try something new. If you get stuck, check out our docs or 
tutorials to get unblocked. I'm excited to see what you'll create. âœŒï¸

Start building <https://replit.com> 

If you're getting into the weeds and looking to level-up your apps' security, 
give our newest video a watch!


 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0D9FMFyNBWo> 

Thanks again & until next time,

Matt <https://www.youtube.com/@mattpalmer>

content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Interested ones can participate. More Details are in the trailing mail.


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Apr 16, 2025 at 9:54â€¯AM
Subject: Fwd: The largest hackathons in India - 'Odoo Hackathon 2025'
To: DEPSTAR IT <depstar_it@charusat.ac.in>






---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Hemant Yadav <hemantyadav.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Apr 15, 2025 at 4:36â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: The largest hackathons in India - 'Odoo Hackathon 2025'
To: Amit Thakkar <amitthakkar.it@charusat.ac.in>, Amit Nayak <
amitnayak.it@charusat.ac.in>, Nirav Bhatt <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>,
Nikita Bhatt <nikitabhatt.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Dr Dweepna Garg <
dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Chirag Patel <
chirag.p.patel@ganpatuniversity.ac.in>
Cc: Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>


Dear sir/madam,

Kindly forward information about odoo hackathon. Details are on trailing
email.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Hemant Yadav <hemantyadav.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, 15 Apr, 2025, 4:30 pm
Subject: The largest hackathons in India - 'Odoo Hackathon 2025'
To: <21it@charusat.edu.in>, <22it@charusat.edu.in>, <23it@charusat.edu.in>,
<24it@charusat.edu.in>, IT <it@charusat.ac.in>, Mrugendra Rahevar <
mrugendrarahevar.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>


Greetings from Odoo India Headquarters!

We are pleased to inform you that Odoo will be organising one of the
largest hackathons in India - 'Odoo Hackathon 2025' on 11 - 12 August 2025.
This hackathon is aimed at identifying and nurturing top talent from across
the country with transforming recruitment methods, and we would be honoured
to have your institution participate.

This hackathon presents a valuable opportunity for final and pre-final year
students to demonstrate their technical skills and potentially secure
internship and job opportunities at Odoo (subject to eligibility).



Hackathon Timeline:

06 July 2025 (11:30 PM): Last date for registration

12 July 2025: First Round (Conducted Virtually)

18 July 2025 (7:00 PM): Announcement of Top 250 Teams

11 - 12 August 2025: Final Round (Offline) at Gandhinagar, Gujarat



For further details and to register, please visit:
https://www.odoo.com/event/odoo-hackathon-2025-7644/register


-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Information Technology
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)



-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Tue, Apr 15, 2025 at 9:54â€¯PM
Subject: Invitation for Indiaâ€™s first satellite â€˜Aryabhata,â€™ a Golden
Jubilee Celebration -Regarding.
To:


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser

Dear Madam/Sir,

Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) ..!

We are pleased to inform you that Indian Space Research Organization (ISRO)
has announced that on 19th April 2025, the satellite â€˜Aryabhataâ€™ Golden
Jubilee will be celebrated on Satellite Technology Day.

Under the leadership of Hon'ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi,
India has achieved several historic milestones in space technology in
recent
years, including the Chandrayaan-3 and Gaganyaan missions. Keeping in mind
his vision to promote â€˜Science and Innovation,â€™ the aim of this
Golden Jubilee Celebration is to foster scientific thinking in
schools, colleges, and universities, as well as to create awareness and
interest
in space science among students and citizens.

*Students, teachers, and all citizens of the state are invited
to participate in an online webinar about the Golden Jubilee of the
first satellite â€˜Aryabhataâ€™ by registering on the following link.*
*Registration Link* :  www.aryabhata.indiaspaceweek.org
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=6c98f7b362717b5494518040239835d1b39501f4&lat=2025&mid=168c5f75ef207776b8f98aaca984d459d8e0a5c6>.


In view of the foregoing,  AICTE requests your institution to encourage
students from your College/Universities to celebrate â€œthe Golden Jubilee of
the first satellite â€˜Aryabhataâ€™â€ also share this information with all the
faculty, students, staff, and others, so that they can benefit from it.

subject: Important: Strict Enforcement of Examination Rules Starting Tomorrow
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that the following examination rules will be strictly enforced starting tomorrow. All students are requested to read and follow the instructions carefully to avoid
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that the following examination rules will be *strictly
enforced starting tomorrow*. All students are requested to read and follow
the instructions carefully to avoid any inconvenience or disciplinary
action.

   1.

   Entry to the examination hall will be *closed 10 minutes before the
   scheduled start time*.
   Latecomers will not be allowed to appear for the exam under any
   circumstances.
   2.

   Any student found involved in *malpractice*â€”such as using someone elseâ€™s
   ID cardâ€”will face *strict disciplinary action*, which may include
*cancellation
   of admission* from the university. If a student does *not have their ID
   card*, they must obtain *prior written permission* from their *Head of
   Department (HOD)* or the *Principal*.
   3.

   All students must place their *mobile phones, smart watches, notes, and
   any other study material* inside their *bags before entering the main
   gate (ground floor)*.

We urge all students to adhere to these examination rules and maintain
discipline during the examination time.
-- 

*Thanks & Regards,*

*Prof. Hitesh Makwana*

*Assistant Professor*

*Department of Information Technology*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*

*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*

*Mo: 8460752501*

--

subject: 3 game-changing techniques when Lovable gets stuck
snippet: Hey there, Ever got stuck in Lovable? Most of the time, the right set of prompts can get Lovable unstuck. Here's my strategies for how to prompt when I need to debug an issue: My go-to prompt: I
content:
Hey there,
Ever got stuck in Lovable? Most of the time, the right set of prompts can get Lovable unstuck.

Here's my strategies for how to prompt when I need to debug an issue:
* My go-to prompt: I ask Lovable to thoroughly think through a problem, identify 5 potential drivers, and propose a plan to work through them step-by-step
* Give Lovable additional context (Developer docs, console error logs, API specs, etc.)
* If not successful, I ask Lovable to add additional error logs & then feed them back in
Ready to try these techniques
in Lovable? ( https://lovable.dev/ )

( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IqWfKj4mUIo&utm_source=marketinglifecycle&utm_medium=email1nontech&utm_campaign=creativeabtest )

Happy building, Anton

content:
()

Hi there,

To save on cloud resources we're currently pausing free-tier projects that are inactive for more than 7 days.

Your project Campus (https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/mtphiixxytkpmhhzryqx) has been paused.

You can unpause your project at any time within the next 90 days. Beyond that point, you canâ€™t unpause your project but youâ€™ll be able to download your data. For more information see the docs (https://supabase.com/docs/guides/platform/migrating-and-upgrading-projects#time-limits).

content:
()

Hi there,


To save on cloud resources I just did a scan of all our projects and identified those which have been inactive for more than 7 days.

Your project Campus (https://supabase.com/dashboard/project/mtphiixxytkpmhhzryqx) was one of those and it is scheduled to be paused in a couple of days.

You can unpause it from the dashboard within 90 days of the pause date. Beyond that point, you won't be able to unpause your project, but youâ€™ll be able to download your data. For more information read the docs (https://supabase.com/docs/guides/platform/migrating-and-upgrading-projects#time-limits).

If you want, you can upgrade your organization to Pro to avoid future pausings, and this can be done from the billing settings (https://supabase.com/dashboard/org/_/billing?panel=subscriptionPlan).

Happy Hacking!

subject: Lovable Update - Code editing, buying domains and status page
snippet: Lovable Update â€” April 9th Hey, The following is an update from the Lovable team â¤ï¸ Introducing Dev Mode Lovable now has a Dev Mode. Enabling Dev Mode lets you not only read your project's code,
content:
******************
Lovable Update â€”
April 9th
******************

Hey,

The following is an update from the Lovable team â¤ï¸

--------------------
Introducing Dev Mode
--------------------

Lovable Dev Mode

Lovable now has a Dev Mode. Enabling Dev Mode lets you not only read your project's code, but also edit it directly inside Lovable.

Read more about it here ( https://x.com/lovable_dev/status/1907816567947096341 ).

---------------------
Buying Custom Domains
---------------------

Buying Custom Domains

You can now purchase a domain directly from your project settings â€” just click â€œBuy a domainâ€, search for what you want, and complete the checkout in a few clicks.

Weâ€™ve partnered with IONOS to make this possible.

Read more here ( https://x.com/lovable_dev/status/1909633656441786608 ).

-------------------
Lovable Status Page
-------------------

Lovable Status Page

Wondering if somethingâ€™s down? You can now check our status page for live updates.

Check it out here ( https://status.lovable.dev/ ).

--------------------------------------
Lovable Livestream tomorrow (Thursday)
--------------------------------------

Lovable Livestream tomorrow (Thursday)

â€‹This livestream isnâ€™t about building live â€” itâ€™s about learning from someone whoâ€™s already done it.

â€‹Mindaugas has used Lovable to prototype and launch tools that scale his expertise, automate his value, and generate real outcomes â€” both for himself and the communities he serves.

Register here ( https://lu.ma/xsaaiu8o ).

That's all for this time.

Best,

The Lovable Team

subject: Unlock Your Future with Cisco: Watch Our Exclusive CCNA Session!
snippet: View online Cisco Networking Academy Logo A Glimpse at Your Future with the CCNA Experience an exciting opportunity to dive into the transformative journey of becoming a Cisco Certified Network
content:
A Glimpse at Your Future with the CCNA
Experience an exciting opportunity to dive into the transformative journey of becoming a Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA). Uncover the potential career pathways that await you and see how this certification can open doors to new opportunities.
Why Attend
Career Opportunities: Learn about the diverse roles and tasks awaiting you as a CCNA Junior Engineer.
Exam Preparation Tips: Get practical advice on preparing for the CCNA exam with resources like Cisco Press and Cisco U.
Expert Insights: Gain valuable advice from industry leaders Hank Preston and Patrick Gargano as they guide you through the CCNA journey.
Meet the Speakers
Hank Preston
Principal Engineer with Learning and Certifications
Cisco
Patrick Gargano
Lead Content Advocate with Learning & Certifications
Cisco
Don't miss this chance to shape your future and open doors to exciting career opportunities. Join us and be part of a transformative experience.

 <[[${FacebookLink}]]>
 <[[${YoutubeLink}]]>
 <[[${TwitterLink}]]>
 <[[${LinkedInLink}]]>
 
Join our feeds to be the first to hear about updates and opportunities, and share your own innovative ideas.

If you do not have a Cisco Networking Academy account, unsubscribe here <http://nsmail.netacad.com/MDU5LVZGWi04MzQAAAGZuaBacRRUoNxesOupm_Dza31jUuZ4H6cL421mWKcPIWWBnXqi7_KA1ayUF684oeVpiupJ0kY=>.
