subject: Fwd: Announcing Ideation Challenge Season 2!ğŸ’¡
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: L&T Digital Energy Solutions <des-marketing@ltptd-des.com> Date: Fri, Mar 21, 2025 at 2:26 PM Subject: Announcing Ideation Challenge Season 2!ğŸ’¡ To
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: L&T Digital Energy Solutions <des-marketing@ltptd-des.com>
Date: Fri, Mar 21, 2025 at 2:26â€¯PM
Subject: Announcing Ideation Challenge Season 2!ğŸ’¡
To:


We are inviting you and your students to register for Ideation Challenge
Season 2 - Registration Started
<https://lntecc.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b2db948b51a888d49b1622c22&id=7137ea1c4b&e=fb71f6949c>

Dear DEVANG PATEL INSTITUTE OF ADVANCE TECHNOLOGY AND RESEARCH Principal,

We are excited to announce the launch of *Ideation Challenge Season 2*, a
competition designed to inspire and empower the next generation of
innovators in the *energy sector*. We invite you to encourage your students
to participate and showcase their creativity in tackling real-world
challenges.

This yearâ€™s challenge focuses on areas like *AI-powered energy optimization*,
*smart grid technologies*, and *sustainable solutions* for a greener
future. Itâ€™s an excellent opportunity for students to apply their
knowledge, collaborate with experts, and contribute to the evolution of the
energy landscape.
*Why should your students Participate?*

   - *Prizes and Recognition: *Compete for a total prize pool of *â‚¹2,50,000*,
   with the* winner taking home â‚¹1,00,000* in cash prizes.
   - *Real-World Impact*: Students will work on addressing global energy
   challenges and help shape the future of the industry.
   - *Collaborate with Industry Experts*: Students will gain exposure to
   professionals and mentors who can guide them in realizing their innovative
   ideas.
   - *Internship opportunity:* The *top 5 teams* will receive *paid
   internships* through the *L&T Elevate program*.

<https://lntecc.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b2db948b51a888d49b1622c22&id=469a706f98&e=fb71f6949c>
*How to Participate?*

   1. *Form a Team*: Teams should consist of 3 students, along with one
   faculty mentor.
   2. *Select a Theme*: Students can choose from a range of exciting themes
   in the competition.
   3. *Submit Their Idea*: Solutions must be uploaded via the Ideation
   dashboard by 25th March.

<https://lntecc.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b2db948b51a888d49b1622c22&id=714bc1f537&e=fb71f6949c>
Click here to register
<https://lntecc.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=b2db948b51a888d49b1622c22&id=d6de228970&e=fb71f6949c>

Accommodation and travel expenses will be provided for the teams selected
for the grand finale!

We believe this competition will provide your students with an incredible
learning experience and help them build valuable skills for their future
careers.

We look forward to seeing your students' innovative ideas. Together, letâ€™s
shape the future of energy!

*If you have any queries, please reach out to des_innovation@lntecc.com
<des_innovation@lntecc.com> for prompt assistance!*

Best regards,
*L&T Digital Energy Solutions*

>>> Dear Students,
>>>
>>> We are excited to announce that *DEPSTAR CSE* has organized in
>>> association with *Talisman Education Solution Pvt. Ltd. (IMS)* to bring
>>> you an exclusive *career guidance seminar* tailored for *6th and 4th
>>> semester students*. This session aims to provide insights into career
>>> opportunities, competitive exams, and essential skills to help you navigate
>>> your academic and professional journey effectively.
>>> *Session Details:*
>>>
>>> *For 6th Semester Students (CSE, IT, CE):*
>>> *Date:* Thursday, 06th March 2025
>>> *Time:* 10:10 AM â€“ 11:10 AM
>>> *Venue:* 329 (SH)
>>>
>>> *For 4th Semester Students (CSE, IT, CE):*
>>> *Date:* Friday, 07th March 2025
>>> *Time:* 12:10 PM â€“ 01:10 PM
>>> *Venue:* 329(SH)
>>> *Whatâ€™s in it for you?*
>>>
>>> âœ”ï¸ *Comprehensive Career Insights:* Understand various career paths,
>>> industry trends, and future opportunities in *technology, IT, and
>>> software development*.
>>> âœ”ï¸ *Competitive Exam Guidance:* Get expert advice on preparing for
>>> exams like *GATE, CAT, GRE, GMAT, and other entrance tests* for higher
>>> education.
>>> âœ”ï¸ *Skill Development Strategies:* Learn how to build a strong skillset
>>> that aligns with industry demands and enhances employability.
>>> âœ”ï¸ *Internships & Job Market Readiness:* Tips on resume building,
>>> networking, and cracking interviews for internships and placements.
>>> âœ”ï¸ *Q&A with Experts:* A chance to interact with IMS professionals and
>>> clarify doubts regarding career choices, study plans, and professional
>>> growth.
>>> *ğŸ¯ Why Should You Attend?*
>>>
>>> Gain *practical knowledge* and real-world insights to shape your career.
>>> Learn directly from *industry experts* with years of experience.
>>> Exclusive opportunity to *network and engage* with professionals and
>>> peers.
>>>  Stay ahead with *strategic preparation tips* for higher studies and
>>> job placements.
>>>
>>> This session is *free* for all students and is designed to help you
>>> make informed decisions about your future. All the students are requested
>>> to attend it without fail. We highly encourage you to *attend and
>>> actively participate* to gain maximum benefits from this initiative.
>>> --

Dear all,

Kindly note that the location has been updated to *324-B*.

On Thu, Mar 20, 2025 at 2:00â€¯PM Spoorthy V <spoorthy.aiml@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

> Dear All,
>
> I hope this email finds you well.
>
> Math for AI club under the Department of Artificial Intelligence &
> Machine Learning, CSPIT, CHARUSAT is organizing an *Expert Talk* on the *"Math
> Magic Behind GANs"* on March 21, 2025.
>
> Discover the fascinating mathematical concepts that power *Generative
> Adversarial Networks (GANs)*, one of the most revolutionary AI techniques
> used in image synthesis, deep learning, and beyond.
>
> This event is open to all students of the institute who are eager to
> explore the intersection of *Mathematics and AI*. No prior GAN experience
> is neededâ€”just bring your curiosity!
>
> Join us for an interactive session that will deepen your understanding and
> spark new insights.
>
>
> *Session Details:*
>
>    - *Date:* March 21, 2025
>    - *Time:* 10:10 AM to 11:15 AM
>    - *Venue:* Will be updated at the earliest.
>    - *Last Date of Registration:*  21/03/2025 (09:00 PM)
>
>
> *Registration Link:* https://tinyurl.com/8usp657c (Seats are limited)
>
>
> Feel free to contact us for any queries on
>
> *Pooja Mehta (22AIML020) - 6351857705 (Student Coordinator)*
>
> *Kesha Desai (22AIML008) - 7573017335 **(Student Coordinator)*
>
> *Spoorthy V. - 8310726037 **(Faculty Coordinator)*
>
>
> We look forward to seeing you there!
>
>
> *Please refer to the attached brochure for details. *

snippet: Dear Students Greetings for the day!!!! Interested one's can attend. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Spoorthy V <spoorthy.aiml@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Mar 20, 2025 at 2:01 PM
content:
Dear Students

Greetings for the day!!!!


Interested one's can attend.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Spoorthy V <spoorthy.aiml@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Mar 20, 2025 at 2:01â€¯PM
Subject: Math for AI Club Activity: Math Magic Behind GANs
To: <22aiml@charusat.edu.in>, <23aiml@charusat.edu.in>, Head CSE <
hod.cse@charusat.ac.in>, <24aiml@charusat.edu.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <
hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>,
DEPSTAR_CE <depstar_ce@charusat.ac.in>, Depstar_CSE <
depstar_cse@charusat.ac.in>, DEPSTAR IT <depstar_it@charusat.ac.in>, HOD
AIML <hod.aiml@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: AIML <aiml@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

I hope this email finds you well.

Math for AI club under the Department of Artificial Intelligence & Machine
Learning, CSPIT, CHARUSAT is organizing an *Expert Talk* on the *"Math
Magic Behind GANs"* on March 21, 2025.

Discover the fascinating mathematical concepts that power *Generative
Adversarial Networks (GANs)*, one of the most revolutionary AI techniques
used in image synthesis, deep learning, and beyond.

This event is open to all students of the institute who are eager to
explore the intersection of *Mathematics and AI*. No prior GAN experience
is neededâ€”just bring your curiosity!

Join us for an interactive session that will deepen your understanding and
spark new insights.


*Session Details:*

   - *Date:* March 21, 2025
   - *Time:* 10:10 AM to 11:15 AM
   - *Venue:* Will be updated at the earliest.
   - *Last Date of Registration:*  21/03/2025 (09:00 PM)


*Registration Link:* https://tinyurl.com/8usp657c (Seats are limited)


Feel free to contact us for any queries on

*Pooja Mehta (22AIML020) - 6351857705 (Student Coordinator)*

*Kesha Desai (22AIML008) - 7573017335 **(Student Coordinator)*

*Spoorthy V. - 8310726037 **(Faculty Coordinator)*


We look forward to seeing you there!


*Please refer to the attached brochure for details. *

-- 
Thanks and regards,

*Dr. Spoorthy. V*,
Assistant Professor,
Department of AI-ML,
CSPIT, CHARUSAT Campus,
Highway, Off, Nadiad - Petlad Rd,
Changa, Gujarat 388421


-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

subject: Seating arrangement for Internal Exam of Semester-4
snippet: Dear Students, Please find attached herewith the seating arrangement for the internal exam. Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. Students are
content:
Dear Students,

Please find attached herewith the seating arrangement for the internal exam.

Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the
examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students must take their
seats in the exam hall at least 15 minutes before the exam time.

The exam will take place in  Exam Hall 201 (First floor) and  Exam Hall 301
(second floor) of the Multi Utility Complex.

Thanks & Regards,
Exam Committee,
DEPSTAR - IT

--

subject: Re: Exclusive IMS Seminar for 6th & 4th Semester Students â€“ Career Guidance: Enhance Your Career Prospects!
snippet: Schedule for IMS Career Guidance : Seminar â€“ 4th Semester Students (Only) Reminder Kindly note that the IMS seminar for 4th-semester students (CSE, IT, CS) has been scheduled as per the updated details
content:
Schedule for IMS Career Guidance : Seminar â€“ 4th Semester Students (Only)

Reminder

Kindly note that the *IMS seminar for 4th-semester students (CSE, IT, CS)* has
been *scheduled* as per the updated details below:

*For 4th Semester Students (CSE, IT, CE):*
*New Date:* Friday, 21st March 2025
*Time:* 12:10 PM â€“ 01:10 PM
*Venue:* 323

Class Coordinators and counsellors of 4th semester are requested to forward
the message in their respective counselling batches and encourage students
for the participation.

>> Dear Students,
>>
>> We are excited to announce that *DEPSTAR CSE* has organized in
>> association with *Talisman Education Solution Pvt. Ltd. (IMS)* to bring
>> you an exclusive *career guidance seminar* tailored for *6th and 4th
>> semester students*. This session aims to provide insights into career
>> opportunities, competitive exams, and essential skills to help you navigate
>> your academic and professional journey effectively.
>> *Session Details:*
>>
>> *For 6th Semester Students (CSE, IT, CE):*
>> *Date:* Thursday, 06th March 2025
>> *Time:* 10:10 AM â€“ 11:10 AM
>> *Venue:* 329 (SH)
>>
>> *For 4th Semester Students (CSE, IT, CE):*
>> *Date:* Friday, 07th March 2025
>> *Time:* 12:10 PM â€“ 01:10 PM
>> *Venue:* 329(SH)
>> *Whatâ€™s in it for you?*
>>
>> âœ”ï¸ *Comprehensive Career Insights:* Understand various career paths,
>> industry trends, and future opportunities in *technology, IT, and
>> software development*.
>> âœ”ï¸ *Competitive Exam Guidance:* Get expert advice on preparing for exams
>> like *GATE, CAT, GRE, GMAT, and other entrance tests* for higher
>> education.
>> âœ”ï¸ *Skill Development Strategies:* Learn how to build a strong skillset
>> that aligns with industry demands and enhances employability.
>> âœ”ï¸ *Internships & Job Market Readiness:* Tips on resume building,
>> networking, and cracking interviews for internships and placements.
>> âœ”ï¸ *Q&A with Experts:* A chance to interact with IMS professionals and
>> clarify doubts regarding career choices, study plans, and professional
>> growth.
>> *ğŸ¯ Why Should You Attend?*
>>
>> Gain *practical knowledge* and real-world insights to shape your career.
>> Learn directly from *industry experts* with years of experience.
>> Exclusive opportunity to *network and engage* with professionals and
>> peers.
>>  Stay ahead with *strategic preparation tips* for higher studies and job
>> placements.
>>
>> This session is *free* for all students and is designed to help you make
>> informed decisions about your future. All the students are requested to
>> attend it without fail. We highly encourage you to *attend and actively
>> participate* to gain maximum benefits from this initiative.
>> --
>> *Thanks & Regards*

Dear Students,
As discussed in lecture, the topics for the upcoming internal theory  
examination are
1. Simulation: Find approximate integration, generate random number from  
discrete probability distribution.  Generate sequence of pseudo random  
number using modulo arithmetic.

2. Compute Karl Pearson correlation coefficient, Compute Spearman's rank  
correlation coefficient and  with interpretations

3 Regression: Simple regression with one predictor, multiple regression  
with two predictors (matrix approach)

subject: Fwd: Invitation for Participation in Event GUSTAKHI 2025 â€“ Unleash Your VoiceÂ
snippet: Thanks and Regards, Shital Sharma Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dean FOH <dean.foh@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Mar 18, 2025 at 8:45â€¯PM
Subject: Invitation for Participation in Event GUSTAKHI 2025 â€“ Unleash Your
Voice
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

We are thrilled to invite all the students of CHARUSAT to participate in
the upcoming event *GUSTAKHI: Where Words and Actions Dare to Defy*, a
vibrant platform for fearless storytellers, bold visionaries, and defiant
poets to express their creativity and challenge norms jointly organised by
Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM), Faculty of Humanities
(FoH) and Womenâ€™s Development Cell (WDC-IIIM).

*ğŸ“… Date:* March 21, 2025

*ğŸ•’ Time:* 10:00 AM onward

*ğŸ“ Venue:* IIIM, CHARUSAT Campus

Join us for four exciting events that celebrate artistic expression,
critical thinking, and bold ideas:
*1ï¸âƒ£ Expert Talk:* *When We Cross the Laxman Rekha: Girls, Women, and
Boundaries to Freedom*

ğŸ™ï¸ Speaker: *Dr. Sonali Pattnaik* â€“ Award-winning Poet, Author, and Visual
Artist

ğŸ”— Register Here : https://forms.gle/CnDiYSumWmCV14FN6
*2ï¸âƒ£ Panel Discussion:* *The Power of Dissent in Society*

ğŸ—£ï¸ Engage in dynamic conversations exploring:

   - The role of rebellious narratives in shaping society
   - Challenges faced by women who speak against norms
   - Crab mentality â€“ Are women their own enemies?
   ğŸ”— Register Here : https://forms.gle/cxn9e3Tdp73RKwSQ8

*3ï¸âƒ£ INK and Outrage:* *Your Writing Reflects Who You Are*

âœï¸ Showcase your creativity in *Poetry*, *Story Writing*, *Comic Creation*,
and more.
Theme: *Freedom*, *Identity*, *Womanhood*, *Self-Love*, and *All Gender
Neutral*
ğŸ”— Register Here: https://forms.gle/Z3UQ6JENtppGQRFh8
*4ï¸âƒ£ Open Mic:* *Bebaak Batein*

ğŸ¤ Step into the spotlight with *Unfiltered Stories*, *Poetry*, and *Artistic
Performances* on bold themes.
ğŸ”— Register Here: https://forms.gle/Tz7JfZn75sZTqGxZ6

*ğŸ“ Registration Deadline:* March 20, 2025

Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to showcase your talent and voice your thoughts
on bold and impactful themes. We encourage all CHARUSAT students to
participate and make GUSTAKHI 2025 a memorable event!

We look forward to an exciting and inspiring event!

For further details, feel free to contact :

*Event Coordinators:* Ms. Margi Mehta (8866486076)| Ms. Pranjal Bhatt
(9429296329)

*Event Convenors:* Dr. Binit Patel | Dr. Bhaskar Pandya
Thanking you in anticipation of your positive response,

With regards,

--

subject: Fwd: Virtual internship opportunities on AICTE Internship Portal by ServiceNow-reg.
snippet: Thanks and Regards, Shital Sharma Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 17, 2025 at 5:26â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: Virtual internship opportunities on AICTE Internship Portal
by ServiceNow-reg.
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <aictenoreply@aicte-india.org>
Date: Mon, Mar 17, 2025 at 5:23â€¯PM
Subject: Virtual internship opportunities on AICTE Internship Portal by
ServiceNow-reg.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Mam,

Greetings from AICTE..

We would like to bring to your kind attention about the upcoming
opportunity for the students on * ServiceNow * .

* ServiceNow * in association with AICTE and their execution partner
SmartBridge is pleased to launch * â€œVirtual Internship Programâ€ * to offer
ServiceNow System Administrator training and certification program for
students graduating in 2026. The cohort would commence on * 18th of March
at 6 PM. *

This initiative aims to equip students with future-ready skills by
providing a structured learning path and access to the ServiceNow
Administrator Certification Course on Now Learning. The program focuses on
enabling faster and more equitable career opportunities in the high-growth
ServiceNow ecosystem.

This Virtual Internship Program will offers :

   - Virtual Instructor - Led Training
   - Access to the Now Learning Platform
   - On completion of 24 hours of learning, you will be qualified to appear
   for CSA (Certified System Administrator) Global certification exam at NO
   cost

* We seek your support to encourage students to apply for the Virtual
Internships at: *

https://internship.aicte-india.org/internship-list.php?cid=Q09SUE9SQVRFNjVlMmQ0YjhjNzYwNzE3MDkzNjQ0MDg=&ctype=cHJpdmF0ZQ
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=BlQGB0RTThURWg1SUBJXCBtVBkJAFgdAdVZdAhEXSgBGGQMCHQ9dTUweCA==&ml=B1cBBgkfAhlXBFJN&sl=cx1ySm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DVirtual%2Binternship%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRktZHUoKXRdUSwxFDFxBTVNaARJXGFxbBwoDFw5AUE0IXRJWQ14RUVlFG11ZFUwbQQkW&ext=Y2lkPVEwOVNVRTlTUVZSRk5qVmxNbVEwWWpoak56WXdOekUzTURrek5qUTBNRGc9JmN0eXBlPWNISnBkbUYwWlE=>
==

We hope that our internship portal, which is entirely free of cost, will be
helpful to your students in adapting to a transparent internship process
and abundant access to real, credible and the most genuine opportunities.

For any queries, please feel free to reach out via email at
skillwallet@thesmartbridge.com
or contact us at 7989881673.

We look forward to your support in this initiative.


* With Regards, *
* Buddha Chandrasekhar, *
* Chief Coordinating Officer *
* AICTE HQs, New Delhi *
* 011-29581423 * * internship@aicte-india.org <internship@aicte-india.org> *

--
Click Here
<http://elink.aicte-india.org/vtrack?clientid=183745&ul=BlQGB0RTThURWg1SUBJXCBtVBkJAFgdAdVZdAhEXSgBGGQMCHQ9dTUweCA==&ml=B1cBBgkfAhlXBFVN&sl=cx1kSm0wTjYuZx9UVQtYDxtQClFHB0tbW1FcAk0NSwZOBw==&pp=0&ga=utm_source%3DNetcore%26utm_campaign%3DVirtual%2Binternship%26utm_medium%3DEmail%26utm_content%3D&fl=WRVFRgJMHQAPWg1aFwNfB0FUTltdBg9TG1pHBEwDUAJGUj0IXQJaUFMHXB8=&ext=cD1zbXVuc3ViJm1pZD02NiZ1aWQ9W1VOSVFJRF0md3ZpZD0wMDE=>
to unsubscribe from this newsletter.

subject: Fwd: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making Competition Details
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: DHRUVI MAHALE <22cs036@charusat.edu.in> Date: Sat, Mar 15, 2025 at 9:07 PM Subject: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: DHRUVI MAHALE <22cs036@charusat.edu.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 15, 2025 at 9:07â€¯PM
Subject: Request to Forward Traffic Awareness Event & Poster Making
Competition Details
To: <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: <pinalhansora.cse@charusat.ac.in>, <22cs051@charusat.edu.in>


Respected Sir,

I hope this email finds you well.

We, the *CSE NSS Unit*, are organizing a *Traffic Awareness Program* on *20th
March 2025* to spread awareness about road safety and responsible driving
among students. As part of this initiative, we are hosting a *Poster Making
Competition* on *18th March 2025*.

ğŸ“Œ *Competition Details:*

   - Open to all students of *Charusat University*
   - Teams of *2 or 3 members* can participate
   - Only *20 teams* will be selected on a *first-come, first-serve* basis
   - The best posters will be showcased at the *Traffic Awareness Program*
   - *Participants must bring their own laptops for designing the poster  *

We request you to kindly forward this information to all departments so
that interested students can participate. They can register by filling out
the form linked below:

ğŸ“ *Registration Link: *https://forms.gle/nFMfduwfUAyHPfzX6

Attached is the *poster for the event* for further reference.
[image: image.png]

For any queries, students can contact:
ğŸ“  *9328068864 **, *99790 99218

We appreciate your support in spreading the word about this initiative.
Looking forward to your kind cooperation.

Best Regards,
Dhruvi mahale



-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

*Dear All, *


We're excited to announce the upcoming batch of the AWS Academy's *"Cloud
Practitioner Foundational"* course, scheduled for March 2025!


Please find the attached brochure


*Benefits on enrollment *



   - 50% AWS exam voucher will be provided to students
   - Full access to all modules of AWS LMS and Hands-on lab.
   - Exam preparation material with Mock exam




*Benefits of AWS Certification*


There are numerous advantages to becoming AWS certified. Amazon Web
Services certificationsâ€¦



   - Validate your skills and knowledge in the preeminent cloud computing
   platform.
   - are consistently listed among the top-paying info-tech certifications
   worldwide.
   - Garner more interviews for aspiring cloud specialists and higher wages
   once hired.
   - Are recognized industry-wide as reliable and well-designed tech
   credentials.
   - Demonstrate credibility and dedication to your cloud computing career
   path.
   - Provide access to a network of like-minded peers and AWS
    thought-leaders.
   - Require recertification which ensures that your AWS skills remain
   current.


Interested students are requested to register themselves using the
following link:

*Registration for Cloud Practitioner Foundational**: *Click Here!!
<https://forms.gle/EAo4zLYKoBKGmc7N9>

Registration is open till next week (22 March 2023)

*Respective faculty members are requested to circulate this to students
in your respective Institute / Branch.*


For any Query contact

Prof. Sanket Suthar (CSPIT-IT)

sanketsuthar.it@charusat.ac.in <sandippatel.it@charusat.ac.in>

Dr. Parth Shah (CSPIT-IT)

parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in

content:
We Are Live!
We're thrilled to announce that "AI and Cybersecurity: The Future of Defense" presented by Cisco, is now live! Join us to explore groundbreaking insights into AI innovations and their impact on cybersecurity. Don't miss this chance to engage with leading experts
Remember to share your favorite moments. Engage with us by using the official event hashtag #FindYourself.

 <[[${FacebookLink}]]>

and Data Science to develop scalable, ethical AI solutions for social good.

Hey there,

I've been on an exhilarating Gen-AI journey, and I can't wait to share it
with you!

Over the past six months, I've delved deep into how AI can revolutionize
education marketing and admissions. From understanding the nuts and bolts
to applying it in real-world scenarios, we've created something truly
game-changing.

Our team has crafted something truly special â€“ an Gen-AI powered product
roadmap that feels human, intuitive, and genuinely helpful for prospective
students & admission teams alike. We've mapped real student journeys and
collaborated with UI designers to create a seamless experience.

Curious about how AI can transform your admissions process? Join our
upcoming webinar where we'll unveil:

   - What's working in Gen-AI & ML for education marketing
   - How to cut through the hype
   - Practical ways to leverage Gen-AI today

content:

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Mar 11, 2025 at 11:45â€¯AM
Subject: Fwd: Just Released : The Architecture of Computer Hardware, System
Software and Networking
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Wiley <acadmktg@wileyindia.com>
Date: Tue, Mar 11, 2025 at 11:35â€¯AM
Subject: Just Released : The Architecture of Computer Hardware, System
Software and Networking
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


<http://mailer.wileyindia.com/misc/pages/link/url:~cHJpbmNpcGFsLmRlcHN0YXJAY2hhcnVzYXQuYWMuaW5+MTczNjY3NTY5MX4xODMyMl8zOTkzfjIwMjUwMX5U~https://www.amazon.in/dp/9363868311/?tag=wiley010a-21>

ISBN: 9789363868311  *INR 699*
Pages: 680

*KEY FEATURES*

   - Organized into five parts, the book first explains the role of the
   computer in information systems and provides an overview of its components.
   - Subsequent sections discuss the representation of data in the
   computer, hardware architecture and operational concepts, the basics of
   computer networking, system software and operating systems, and various
   interconnected systems and components.
   - Featured an India-specific real-life case study at the beginning of
   each chapter.
   - Included with new self-evaluation question types: Multiple Choice,
   Review, and Application-Based Questions to equip the knowledge and
   confidence to excel in interviews.
   - Added projects to each part to provide an integrative learning
   experience

*ABOUT THE AUTHORS*
*Irv Englander*
Bentley University *Wilson Wong*
Worcester Polytechnic Institute
*ABOUT THE BOOK*
Technology Approach is designed to help students majoring in information
technology (IT) and information systems (IS) understand the structure and
operation of computers and computer-based devices. Requiring only basic
computer skills, this accessible textbook introduces the basic principles
of system architecture and explores current technological practices and
trends using clear, easy-to-understand language. Throughout the text,
numerous relatable examples, subject-specific illustrations, and in-depth
case studies reinforce key learning points and show students how important
concepts are applied in the real world.
<http://mailer.wileyindia.com/misc/pages/link/url:~cHJpbmNpcGFsLmRlcHN0YXJAY2hhcnVzYXQuYWMuaW5+MTczNjY3NTY5MX4xODMyMl8zOTkzfjIwMjUwMX5U~https://www.amazon.in/dp/9363868311/?tag=wiley010a-21>
For more information or to request a desk copy please contact
*  acadmktg@wiley.com <acadmktg@wiley.com>* *wileyindia.com
<http://wileyindia.com>*

You are receiving this email because of your relationship with the sender. To
safely unsubscribe or modify your subscription settings please click here
<http://mailer.wileyindia.com/misc/pages/subscribe/MTgzMjJfMzk5M35wcmluY2lwYWwuZGVwc3RhckBjaGFydXNhdC5hYy5pbn4wX0N+MTczNjY3NTY5MQ==>

subject: Fwd: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
snippet: Thanks and Regards, Shital Sharma Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Coordinator NSS Unit- CHARUSAT <coordinator.nss@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Mar 11, 2025 at 12:06â€¯PM
Subject: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
To: <family@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Charusat Family <
charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

The *CHARUSAT NSS Cell* is pleased to invite you to participate in the *Viksit
Bharat Youth Parliament 2025*, an incredible opportunity to express your
vision for a developed India. This initiative, supported by the *Ministry
of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India*, encourages youth engagement in
policy discussions and leadership development.
*Event Details:*

*District-Level Competition:* 17th March 2025
*Venue:* Sardar Patel University, Vallabh Vidyanagar

*Register Here:* https://mybharat.gov.in/ -> Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament
2025 <https://mybharat.gov.in/mega_events/viksit-bharat-youth-parliament>
(*Register as soon as possible!*)
*Deadline : 16th March 2025*
*Participation Guidelines:*

   - Open to students aged *18-25 years*.
   - Submit a *1-minute video* on the topic: *"What does Viksit Bharat mean
   to you?"*
   - Language options: *Gujarati, Hindi, or English*.
   - *Selected 150 participants* will compete at the District Level.
   - *Top 10* will advance to the State Level, and winners will qualify for
   the *National Level* competition.

For detailed guidelines and further information, please find the *attached
PDF*.

*We encourage all eligible students to take advantage of this opportunity
and make CHARUSAT proud! *

For any queries, feel free to contact the *CHARUSAT **NSS Cell*.
-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

snippet: Thanks and Regards, Shital Sharma Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 10, 2025 at 4:14â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: Announcing PENTATHON 2025 â€“ A National-Level Cybersecurity
Challenge -Regarding.
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 10, 2025 at 2:32â€¯PM
Subject: Announcing PENTATHON 2025 â€“ A National-Level Cybersecurity
Challenge -Regarding.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/07-Mar/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Dear Sir/Madam,

We are pleased to announce the launch of PENTATHON 2025, a premier
national-level hackathon on Capture the Flag (CTF) Challenge and VAPT
exercise, jointly organized by NCIIPC, AICTE and MIC. This initiative aims
to identify and nurture top talent in cybersecurity, and Vulnerability
Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT).

About PENTATHON 2025:
îéš¼ Stage 1 (Online Qualification Round): A jeopardy-style Capture The Flag
(CTF) challenge covering Web Attacks, Network Exploitation, API
Vulnerabilities, OT SCADA, and more.
îéš¼ Stage 2 (Physical Grand Finale): A high-stakes live cybersecurity
exercise focused on protecting Critical Information Infrastructure (CII)
from advanced cyber threats.
îéš¼ Stage 3: Bootcamp and Training for shortlisted teams


Eligibility Criteria:
1. Regular Students (UG/PG/PHD) from the Higher Educational Institutions
(HEIs) are eligible to apply for this hackathon
2. No Professional or startup can take part in this hackathon

This hackathon will provide participants with an opportunity to engage in
real-world cybersecurity challenges, test their skills against the best
minds in the country, and contribute to national cyber resilience.

îæ± Register your interest and stay updated. The deadline for submitting
your interest is 15th March 2025.

Website: https://mic.gov.in/pentathon2025/
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=68f887221a9ba660e1823af68c5f21e03c147b7b&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


Register to show your interest: https://forms.gle/Q5zLPueEa2AUZjXXA
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=ce50a54793962c9d1808559bbf1460bd1d735562&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


Link to creatives:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1wD-IdtwxhE2_q6o6xsPqwxM_XtXytbOp?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=abc0bcd1488b57d96d8c7f6663248251b19bfd58&lat=2025&mid=99515409b676c4dc5e9dc25e0c7bc11be08b6cfe>


We look forward to your participation in this prestigious event. For any
queries, feel free to reach out.

*Best regards,*
*PENTATHON 2025 Organizing Team*
Share it on Social Media [image: social icon]
<https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fjan-sampark.nic.in%2Fcampaigns%2F2025%2F07-Mar%2FAICTE%2Findex.html>

Subject: Fwd: Call for Student Entries â€“ FICCI Best Animated Frames (BAF)
Awards 2025 | Send entries latest by 15 March 2025
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: FICCI FRAMES <frames@ficci.com>
Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 4:41â€¯PM
Subject: Call for Student Entries â€“ FICCI Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards
2025 | Send entries latest by 15 March 2025
To: principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in <principal.dptr@charusat.ac.in>



Dear Academician,

Greetings from FICCI!

*We are pleased to invite students from your Institute/ University to send
their entries for BAF Awards 2025 across various categories - Animation,
Visual Effects (VFX), Gaming, Comics, and Extended Reality (AVGC-XR).* This
is a unique opportunity for aspiring creators to gain national recognition
and showcase their talent amongst industry veterans, studios, and
decision-makers.

*Best Animated Frames (BAF) Awards ceremony will take place on March 27,
2025, at Sofitel, Mumbai.*

*Award Categories for Students:*

   - Best Student Short Film (2D & 3D Animation)
   - Best Student Character Design
   - Best Student Game Design & Development
   - Best Student Visual Effects (VFX) Project
   - Best Student Comic or Graphic Novel
   - Best Student XR (AR/VR/MR) Experience


*Why should Students participate in BAF Awards 2025?*
âœ” Gain National Recognition â€“ Showcase your work to industry leaders and
global experts.
âœ” Engage with Top Creators â€“ Network with leading animation, gaming, and
VFX professionals.
âœ” Get Industry Insights â€“ Attend thought-provoking sessions on the latest
AVGC-XR trends.
âœ” Win Prestigious Awards â€“ Boost your career prospects with a BAF
Award-winning portfolio.
âœ” Showcase at FICCI FRAMES â€“ Your work could be featured at Indiaâ€™s biggest
M&E industry platform.

*Judging Criteria:*
A distinguished jury panel comprising renowned animators, game developers,
VFX supervisors, and industry experts will evaluate the entries based on
creativity, technical execution, and storytelling impact. Winning entries
will receive trophies, certificates, and industry-wide recognition,
providing an unparalleled boost to emerging talent.

*Timeline and Process:*

   - Submit your entries *before March 15, 2025* at
*https://registrations.ficci.com/baf/baf-reg-online.asp
   <https://post.spmailtechnolo.com/f/a/50Mh_Ln6TQ5haliEm6dp4g~~/AAUvfxA~/2qiZh96vMLcNGup3r4X4MBhkc5uqHDaC9M-6oC8AxK7lorIMn4tHtvpAJshlAn_--yWMHD_eBUW1QpoHDhWvbCYTT4ffD5wriwsjbKEqAzrOd_KH_K6zEip92hHztUhgW0WhLQK7NAFh8WH_xAxjkCt3if2uvE84e1S-AV4bD_EPlkr5BRJoDADOtKQ61SUfhZRQXW-JQsQ1gs2F7UE82_LhjCoIMqJ7tEE2CUFiJ5tOZeWAq5t2FiMdxRWtn4vr>*

For queries, contact Ms. Pratibha Sharma at *pratibha.sharma@ficci.com
<https://post.spmailtechnolo.com/f/a/2TeVTq_Y8j8LyZbgFear1A~~/AAUvfxA~/2qiZh96vMLcNGup3r4X4MBhkc5uqHDaC9M-6oC8AxK7lorIMn4tHtvpAJshlAn_--yWMHD_eBUW1QpoHDhWvbCYTT4ffD5wriwsjbKEqAzo-Al3YPDE298QKfm28tgBCk9zyOrjjNWK5CfOUSFUPn-dsTOW4uh9-Czg7wFcLt3fkHX3PF0FQBxsbDxnh0GjZR800KOyADsOvsINlxNHJSFRC8IcEV-luzWPhrBI90vfcvPTytqemOAFVIxYaO1r->*

We look forward to celebrating the creative brilliance at BAF Awards 2025!


Warm Regards,

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Mar 10, 2025 at 9:16â€¯AM
Subject: Fwd: Invitation to FLUX 2025 â€“ IITRAMâ€™s Annual Tech Fest
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Rajkotiya Devkrishna <Devkrishna.Rajkotiya.23co@iitram.ac.in>
Date: Sun, Mar 9, 2025 at 6:50â€¯PM
Subject: Invitation to FLUX 2025 â€“ IITRAMâ€™s Annual Tech Fest
To: principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: President Student Senate -SAC <president.ssenate@iitram.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,



Greetings from IITRAM, Ahmedabad!



We are excited to invite Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and
Research (DEPSTAR) to FLUX 2025, our annual Tech Fest, which will be held
on March 21st, 22nd, and 23rd, 2025. This event brings together students
from various institutions to compete, innovate, and collaborate in a series
of technical, entrepreneurial, and cultural activities.



Event Highlights:

Technical Competitions â€“ AI Innovation Sprint, DSA Showdown, Startup Idea
Pitch, UX/UI Challenge, and more.

Workshops & Hackathons â€“ Hands-on learning experiences with industry
experts.

Cultural Night (March 23rd) â€“ Live performances by Piyush Sharma and DJ
Honey.



We invite students from your esteemed institution to participate and make
this event memorable. We kindly request your support in sharing this
information with your students.



Event details can be found in the brochure attached with this email.



Registration Details:

Participants can register via QR code from the Event Poster.



For any queries or additional materials, please contact us using E-mail
president.ssenate@iitram.ac.in or contact +91-9925601044 , +91-8238020472 .





Best Regards,

Rajkotiya Devkrishna

Organizing Committee

FLUX, 2025

IITRAM , Ahmedabad

--

AI and Cybersecurity: The Future of Defense

Explore AI-driven security with Omar Santos, a leading expert and
Distinguished Engineer at Cisco. AI is revolutionizing the security
landscape, offering unprecedented capabilities in threat detection and
response, yet introducing complexities with AI agents and shadow risks.

This session will delve into these dynamics, offering insights into
advancements like test-time compute and edge AI. Don't miss this
opportunity to learn from a renowned authority in cybersecurity. Register
now to be part of this transformative event.

subject: Reg. Interaction with IIT faculties on 13th March 2025
snippet: Dear students, Greetings!!! It is a great pleasure to share that the interaction with two esteemed faculties of IITs is scheduled for 13th March, 2025 (Thursday) in online mode during 11 AM to 12 PM.
content:
Dear students,

Greetings!!!

It is a great pleasure to share that the interaction with two esteemed
faculties of IITs is scheduled for 13th March, 2025 (Thursday) in online
mode during 11 AM to 12 PM.

All the interested participants are requested to register for the session
through the below link without fail.

Registration Link: https://forms.gle/ipcYiA3LanwWpzVcA

*The students who have any doubts regarding minor certification programs
from IITs may also join the session. The session may clear your doubt in
any way. *

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 2
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill â€” the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/cde86d8c0da7b957c934ecfd99c713dcf0d13606]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL â€” the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHATâ€™S INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE â€“ Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION â€“ Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS â€“ Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE â€“ Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE â€“ Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS â€“ Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/6a1d41c8c004b6b45507b44a8baa19329fc0135a]

Warm regards,
MR. KRUTEN PATEL
Executive Officer - Corporate Communications

subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat Hackathon
snippet: Thanks and Regards, Shital Sharma Assistant Professor, Department of Information Technology, Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) Charotar University of Science and
content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 9:29â€¯AM
Subject: Fwd: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>



Please motivate students. If any type of assistants is required, feel free
to contact HoDs or to me.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <info@gujgov.edu.in>
Date: Sat, Mar 8, 2025 at 12:42â€¯AM
Subject: Students' Active Participation in 6th Edition Smart Gujarat
Hackathon
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear,,

The Education Department, Gujarat has been doing persistent efforts to
institutionalize the Innovation & Startup Ecosystem in the State through
policy, platform, and processes. To augment the support system for
nurturing student Start-ups in the State, second edition of Student
Start-up and Innovation Policy (SSIP 2.0) was launched on 05 January 2022.

Under the Policy, various flagship initiatives have been envisaged through
which youth can get adequate opportunities to harness their creative
potential. We have pioneered various Open Innovation Programmes like
hackathon and executed them at a large-scale.

The 6th Edition of â€œSmart Gujarat Hackathonâ€ with special focus on
Artificial will be a step forward towards building smart and sustainable
solutions to complex challenges. In this edition of hackathon around 15,000
students are expected to participate and work on problem statements.
Challenges from various departments of the State Government, Public Sector
Undertakings, Municipal Corporations, District Collectorate, District
Panchayats and industries will be broadcasted to students across
universities, institutes, and schools.

The program will feature problem statements from various sectors providing
students with ample opportunities to engage in Artificial Intelligence and
other emerging technology-based solution- oriented projects. Moreover,
winning teams will not only receive cash prizes but also invaluable
mentorship support from nodal officers of government departments and
benefits from education department of Government of Gujarat, further
encouraging their pursuit of innovation and excellence.

We request all students from your institute to actively participate in 6th
edition of â€œSmart Gujarat Hackathonâ€. This event presents a fantastic
opportunity for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and
innovative thinking. To get more details and further update regarding
registration process and list of sectors students can visit the following
link: https://ssipgujarat.in/hackathon. Teams must select a problem
statement online after registration and login in the portal.

Last date for Team registration is 10th March 2025 and synopsis Submission
is 14th March 2025.

Kindly share this with all your students and faculty members so that they
can participate in this event. For any query, please revert us at
ssipgujarat@gmail.com





*Team HackathonStudent Start-up and Innovation PolicyEducation Department,
Government of Gujarat3rd Floor, Block No:2 ,Karmayogi BhavanSector 10-A
382010*

--

wrote:

> Hands-On Workshop on High Performance Computing
>
> Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club at CHARUSAT
>
> Dear Students and Faculty members,
>
> We are excited to invite you to a two-day hands-on workshop on High
> Performance Computing (HPC) at CHARUSAT. This workshop will provide you
> with practical experience in parallel computing techniques and technologies.
> *Workshop Details:*
>
> ğŸ“… Date: 11-12 March 2025
>
> ğŸ“ Venue: 323A, A6 Building
>
> ğŸ‘¥ Maximum participants: 40
>
> ğŸ’° Registration: Free of cost
>
> *Note:* E-certificates will be provided to participants with 100%
> attendance and 100% allocated task submission.
> About the Workshop
>
> This workshop will introduce you to the Supercomputing Facility at
> CSPIT-CHARUSAT. You'll gain hands-on experience with various parallel
> computing paradigms including:
>
>    - â€¢ GPU Programming with CUDA
>    - â€¢ Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
>    - â€¢ Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
>    - â€¢ Multi-GPU training with PyTorch
>
> Workshop Schedule
> Time Day 1 (March 11) Day 2 (March 12)
> 9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Super computing in action - Transforming Science and
> Innovation
> Dr. Amit Thakkar
> 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
> Dr. Ritesh Patel GPU Programming with CUDA (continued)
> Dr. Ritesh Patel
> 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch Break Lunch Break
> 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP (continued)
> Dr. Ritesh Patel Multi-GPU training with PyTorch
> Mr. Harshal Yagnik
> 2:00 PM - 4:20 PM Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
> Mr. Harshal Yagnik Multi-GPU training with PyTorch (continued)
> Mr. Harshal Yagnik
> Benefits
>
>    - â€¢ Hands-on experience with the Supercomputing Facility
>    - â€¢ Learn from experts in the field of high-performance computing
>    - â€¢ E-certificates for participants with 100% attendance and task
>    completion
>    - â€¢ Valuable skills for research and industry applications
>
> Registration Information
>
> The workshop is open to all students and faculty members. Registration is
> required as seats are limited to 40 participants.
>
> Limited seats available - Register today!
> Register Now
> <#m_1511392901371937780_m_1055974965501917814_m_-163422073397196282_>
>
> Registration closes on March 9, 2025 or when all seats are filled
>
> Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club |
> CSPIT-CHARUSAT
>
> "EMPOWERING THE POTENTIAL OF PARALLEL COMPUTING"
>
>
> With Regards,
>
> Amit Thakkar, Ph.D.
> Professor & Head
> Department of Computer Science & Engineering
> Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT)
> Charotar University of Science & Technology.(CHARUSAT)
> Jay Swaminarayan.
>

subject: Fwd: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in Engineering (WIE)
snippet: Dear All, Greetings for the day!!! Interested one's can attend ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 9:37 AM
content:
Dear All,

Greetings for the day!!!

Interested one's can attend

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 9:37â€¯AM
Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
Engineering (WIE)
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>



Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering Affinity
Group and Seminar talk on "Women Innovators in Tech: Success Stories and
Lessons Learned"

Newly Established IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering
Affinity Group invites all female students and faculties of CHARUSAT to
participate in the inauguration ceremony followed by a seminar talk.
About IEEE WIE

*Vision:* "To be globally recognized for its contributions in STEM fields.
Our goal is to facilitate the recruitment and retention of women in
technical disciplines globally. We envision a vibrant community of IEEE
women and men collectively using their diverse talents to innovate for the
benefit of humanity."

*Mission:* "To connect, support, and inspire women and girls worldwide, and
facilitate their recruitment and retention in STEM fields, fostering
technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity."
Guest Speaker
Ruzan Khambatta

A visionary entrepreneur, social innovator, and passionate advocate for
women's empowerment. Through her groundbreaking initiatives like Wajra O'
Force, PoliceHEART 1091, and Halla Bol, she has transformed thousands of
lives. Her success mantra? Small steps today lead to giant leaps tomorrow!

Learn more about Ruzan Khambatta <https://ruzankhambatta.com/wizzo1/>
Event Details

   - *Date:* *10th March 2025*
   - *Time:* *9:45 AM to 11:00 AM*
   - *Venue:* *2nd floor, Seminar hall, CSPIT EC-EE(A6 building), CHARUSAT*

This event is a milestone moment as we officially launch the Student
Chapter of WiE Society of IEEE, a dedicated community to uplift and support
women in technology. Whether you're a student, professional, or tech
enthusiast, this is an opportunity to connect, learn, and be part of a
movement that drives change.

E-Certificates will be provided to all the participants.

Let's come together to celebrate, empower, and innovate!
Register Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1YtXFaNHx3A12jsPhcPr6jRjZWwjOh48EskA9I3Ra9Mg/edit>

Looking forward to your presence!

Regards,

-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand, Gujarat, India.
M: 7874840344
https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Gzsxo-oAAAAJ&hl=en


-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

subject: Invitation to Expert Session on "Practical Perspectives on Algorithm Design and Optimization"
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an expert talk on "Practical Perspectives on Algorithm Design and Optimization" by Mr. Amit Parmar, a Senior Data Scientist at Geodigit Insurance
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce an expert talk on *"Practical Perspectives on
Algorithm Design and Optimization"* by *Mr. Amit Parmar*, a Senior Data
Scientist at *Geodigit Insurance* with expertise in *AI, ML, DL,
Recommender Systems, and Generative AI*.

This session will provide valuable insights into the design and analysis of
algorithms from an industry perspective.

*Event Details:*

Â·  *Date:* 8th March 2025

Â·  *Time: **12:00 PM - 04:00 PM: *Expert Session and Interaction

Â·  *Venue:* 325 Second Floor Classroom

Interested students are requested to register through the following Google
Form:
*Click here to Register <https://forms.gle/GuUnA4dqRczjDSKc9>*


Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to gain practical knowledge and interact with
an industry expert!
--
Best Regards,
Chintal Upendra Raval,
Assistant Professor,
Department of Information Technology
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research
Charotar University of Science and Technology

--

content:
Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students,

The CHARUSAT NSS Unit is organizing the *University Level Gujarat Cultural
Elocution Competition â€“ 2025* as part of the initiative by the State NSS
Department. We invite interested students to participate and showcase their
oratory skills.

*Date:* March 8, 2025
*Time:* 12:15 PM (Updated) Onwards
*Venue: *RPCP Auditorium
*Levels:* University â†’ Zone â†’ State

*Topics (Choose One):*

   - Character Building for Nation Building
   - Importance of Constitution in a Citizenâ€™s Life
   - Youth: The Future of the Nation â€“ Challenges and Responsibilities
   - Values, Morality, and Ethics: Pillars of Indian Culture
   - Developed India 2047: Vision for a Better Future

*Eligibility:* Participants must be born on or after January 1, 1999.
*Registration Deadline:* March 6, 2025, 8:00 PM


*Registration Link:* <goog_111173522>https://forms.gle/LPeLhMmYZheqgaRr9

For further details, please refer to the attached PDFs.

For any queries, contact:

   - *Mr. Kishan Patel* (NSS Coordinator) â€“ +91 97244 42255
   - *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* (Student Coordinator) â€“ +91 63539 33976

*We encourage students to participate.*

Best Regards,
*NSS Unit, CHARUSAT*

---Thanks & Regards---
*Dhruv D. Rupapara*
2nd Year B.Tech. EC
NSS Student Coordinator
V.T. Patel Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering
CSPIT, CHARUSAT, Changa 388421

Cc: Parth Shah <parthshah.ce@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sir/Madam,

Please share the email below with your students to get benefit from
subsidized academic costs as an EC-Council Academia Partner.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome â€œCHARUSATâ€ *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *110+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*Whatâ€™s new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*â€¢ ShellGPT* â€“ Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*â€¢ ChatGPT *â€“ Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
â€¢ *FraudGPT* â€“ Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
â€¢ *WormGPT* â€“ An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
â€¢ *DeepExploit* â€“ AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
â€¢ *Nebula* â€“ Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
â€¢ *Veed.io* â€“ Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst

   - Security Analyst L1

   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst

   - Network Engineer

CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA


*Testimonials:*

subject: ğŸ”¥ Exciting Replit Updates: Mobile, New Agent & Assistant, and More!
snippet: February was a whirlwind! I'm eager to share our recent updates with you. ğŸš€ Thursday, March 6, 2025 Matt with Replit here âœŒï¸ February was an incredibly busy monthâ€”I'm excited to share what we
content:
February was a whirlwind! I'm eager to share our recent updates with you. ğŸš€



 <https://replit.com>



Thursday, March 6, 2025


Matt with Replit here âœŒï¸

 February was an incredibly busy monthâ€”I'm excited to share what we've been up 
to.

Last month's updates include:


 *  The new and improved Replit Mobile App
 * Building iOS & Android apps on Replit (from the Mobile App if you'd like!)
 * Agent v2 ğŸ¤¯
 * Claude 3.7 Sonnet support

and much, much more!




ğŸ“±Make an app for that, anywhere



 We've completely rebuilt Replit Mobile from the ground up! Our new mobile app 
delivers a faster, more intuitive coding experience on the go.

 Head to https://replit.com/mobile <https://replit.com/mobile> to give it a 
shot. You can check out a full walkthroughhere. 
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_yQmQMCoYb0>


Build apps for your phone 



 Replit now supports iOS and Android app creation thanks to React Native and 
Expo.

This includes: enhanced iOS and Android development capabilities, integrated 
mobile preview and debugging tools, and streamlined app store deployment via 
Expo EAS.

 Check out our tutorial further down to get started!


ğŸ’ª Agent and Assistant


Assistant now supports Claude Sonnet 3.7 as the default model in "Advanced" 
mode, allowing you to build with the latest & greatest models.



Agent v2 (Early Access)


We've launched a new Agent experience that is now available to all users. This 
new Agent is faster, more accurate, and more capable than ever.

 It's also powered by Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Anthropic's most advanced model yet.



You can enable the new experience with "Explorer Mode" in Replit.

 Learn how to do so here <https://youtu.be/pE_XT2TaXCA>.


We â¤ï¸ databases


Database operations are now faster than ever, with the most expensive 
operation reduced from 200ms to under 1ms.

 Our database viewer now uses Drizzle Studio, providing a more robust and 
developer-friendly experience for interacting with your data.



ğŸ“š Docs improvements


We've re-built our docs from the ground up to be more beautiful and 
user-friendly.

 In addition, we rolled out new Quickstart and Introduction pages to make it 
easier to get started on Replit.



The new docs also feature LLM-friendly featuresâ€”a "copy page" button that 
copies the current page directly to markdown, as well as support for 
/llms-full.txt and /llms.txt.




ğŸ“¹ Videos & tutorials


Make an iOS app on Replit. Learn all you need to build your first iOS app and 
get it running with Replit + Expo.


 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wLQusAwfjdY>

Want to deploy a Grok 3 App? You can do it fast on Replit. Here's a 3 minute 
tutorial on how to deploy an app built with Grok. We hope you like itâ€”Elon did 
<https://x.com/elonmusk/status/1892818147834536253>.


 <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pvOsDB3xUWg>

ğŸš€ Get started and share your work


If you've been waiting to give Replit a shot there's never been a better time. 
Our users are building faster than ever. Give it a shot today.

Try Replit Core <> 

If you've already built an amazing app with Replit, share it with us 
<https://forms.gle/sAqiKGTvXYa9Hjzc9> to be featured in an upcoming email.


ğŸ”® Looking Ahead


As always, we've been shipping harder to make your experience betterâ€”for 
faster apps, & stronger results.

 Stay tuned for more of the latest & greatest in building with AI.

Until next time, <https://www.linkedin.com/in/vanessakahkesh>

Matt <> @ Replit

 <https://x.com/mattppal>

 <https://twitter.com/Replit> <https://www.linkedin.com/company/repl-it>  
<https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgoJjdR6-7AMu9fDitb6nVw> 
<https://www.instagram.com/repl.it/?hl=en>



Sent by Replit

1001 E Hillsdale Blvd, Suite 400, Foster City, CA 94404 


Unsubscribe here 
<https://links.replit.com/s/u/XFv5_OjA6acK6abkaFJnJS-Clvg1k7CfU_9JeZLxkxe0YqJOmN62FYEYKMwHNANaqvw6HIz0CEQeiR9lL3kdhU5KTysMrTeKoolQPiNmARxcUcqdOKstGwebThBgf2fNjaot2g3lVCYwD863f-h2vmCFI1TCEmYpLRH49VVGLeCE9J9saXsUXM9QAxwKoWopszil9L5Zmp7nOxTd/PN96SQVfO70e5KB4tskWs-qDCB-V6RcL/6>

snippet: Dear All, You are aware that the High-Level Committee of the Center of Excellence is going to visit our University on 9th March 2025. In this context, 9 th March, 2025 (Sunday) shall be a working day.
content:
Dear All,


You are aware that the High-Level Committee of the Center of Excellence is
going to visit our University on 9th March 2025. In this context, *9th March,
2025 (Sunday) shall be a working day. *


*Time table of Thursday will be followed on 9th March 2025. As on 13th
March 2025 (Thursday) is a holiday.*

-- 
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RITIKA JANI.*
*Assistant Professor.*
*Department of Information Technology,*

*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology And Research (DEPSTAR)*
*CHARUSAT, Changa.*

*"The More you Sweat in Practice the Less you Bleed in Battle"*

--

subject: Secure Tomorrow's World: AI and Cybersecurity Session Presented by Cisco
snippet: Join us to find out at Find Yourself in the Future View online Cisco Networking Academy Logo AI and Cybersecurity: The Future of Defense Explore AI-driven security with Omar Santos, a leading expert
content:
AI and Cybersecurity: The Future of Defense
Explore AI-driven security with Omar Santos, a leading expert and Distinguished Engineer at Cisco. AI is revolutionizing the security landscape, offering unprecedented capabilities in threat detection and response, yet introducing complexities with AI agents and shadow risks. 

This session will delve into these dynamics, offering insights into advancements like test-time compute and edge AI. Don't miss this opportunity to learn from a renowned authority in cybersecurity. Register now to be part of this transformative event.
Meet the Speaker & Host
Omar Santos
Distinguished Engineer
Cisco

content:
*Thanks and Regards,*


*Shital Sharma Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Information Technology,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*Changa, Anand,*
*Gujarat, India.*



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, 5 Mar 2025 at 3:41â€¯PM
Subject: Fwd: Opportunity to Visit Industry in Vadodara on 7th March 2025
in Cloud Computing domain
To: DEPSTAR IT <depstar_it@charusat.ac.in>


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>

Subject: Fwd: Opportunity to Visit Industry in Vadodara on 7th March 2025
in Cloud Computing domain
To: Head CSE Depstar <hod.csds@charusat.ac.in>, Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <
hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Respected sir(s)

A request to please circulate it to semester 4 and semester 6 students.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr Dweepna Garg <dweepnagarg.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Mar 5, 2025 at 12:22â€¯PM
Subject: Opportunity to Visit Industry in Vadodara on 7th March 2025 in
Cloud Computing domain
To: <22dce@charusat.edu.in>, <23dce@charusat.edu.in>


Dear Students,

With a *focus to strengthen industry-academia collaborations*, hereby is an
opportunity for the students who are working/exploring the Cloud Computing
domain to understand the work culture in the industry along with the skills
required to work on the projects followed by discussion on a few selected
projects by company officials.

In this regard, *we are offering an opportunity for only 15 selected
students from semester 4 and semester 6 of DEPSTAR who have academic
achievements* (cleared certification courses; or any other) *in the cloud
computing domain or have worked on notable projects in the Cloud Computing
domain*. These students will get the chance to visit a company in Vadodara
on 7th March 2025 to observe their work culture, explore the scope of cloud
computing in industries, and understand the key skills required to
contribute to cloud computing projects.

Application Process:

   1. *Fill out the Google Form*: Please fill out the form link:
   https://forms.gle/tzjBvBEJfms4zzqUA
   2. *Upload Proof*: Attach necessary proof (e.g., certificates, project
   reports, GitHub links, etc.) that demonstrates your achievements or project
   work.
   3. *Deadline*: The data must be submitted by *5th March 2025 TODAY*.

Selection Process:

   - Only *15 students* will be selected by the scrutinizing team based on
   the provided data and supporting proof.
   - An *interaction session* will be scheduled with the selected
   candidates tomorrow to discuss about the company background and the points
   to be kept in mind with respect to the interaction with company officials.

This is an opportunity to gain insight into the industry and expand your
professional horizons.

*Note*: Please ensure that all necessary information and proof are
uploaded; as incomplete submissions will not be considered.

Thank You

-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)



-- 
Regards:
Dr Dweepna Garg
Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
Department of Computer Engineering
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Contact No. : 02697-265321 (Intercom)

--

snippet: Dear Female Students, There's a health check-up program available for women on discounted rates, open to everyone! Don't miss this chance to take care of your health. ---------- Forwarded
content:
Dear Female Students,

There's a health check-up program available for *women on discounted rates*,
*open to everyone*! Donâ€™t miss this chance to take care of your health.

From: Charusat Hospital <coo.ch@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Mar 5, 2025 at 12:53â€¯PM
Subject: Free Consultation for women & heavy discount in Mammography
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,
International Women's day fall on 08/03/25.
It gives us immense pleasure to announce that from the day of
"International Women's day" i e from  08/03/25 to 31/03/25 CHARUSAT
Hospital is passing the following benefits to the women.

1) THERE WILL NOT BE ANY CONSULTATION CHARGES IN O.P.D. FOR WOMEN FROM
08/03/25 TILL 31/03/25 ON ALL THE WORKING DAYS.

2) THERE WILL BE 70% DISCOUNT in the CHARGES FOR THE MAMMOGRAPHY, WHICH
WILL BE ONLY Rs 300/- INSTEAD OF Rs 1000/-.

So please circulate this message to the maximum number of your staff and
students so that they can take advantage of these schemes.

Dr Jagan Mazmudar

To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/04-Mar/AICTE2/index.html>
------------------------------

Namaste to All,

*Warm Greetings from the IKS Division!*

The IKS Division announces and encourages participation in the IKS-TKDL
Workshop-7, organized by IKS Division in collaboration with the CSIR-TKDL
Unit. This workshop will cover Indian Knowledge Systems (IKS), Traditional
Knowledge (TK), Intellectual Property Rights (IPR), and People's Rights,
with a focus on ethical principles and knowledge protection.

Dates: 1-4 April 2025; Assessment: 7 April 2025

Time: 3:30 PM - 5:00 PM

Format: Online

Eligibility: Open to students, researchers, faculty members, and anyone
keen to learn about Traditional Knowledge and IPR.

Certification: Issued to participants scoring 75% or more in assessments.

Register now: tinyurl.com/ybuudhr5
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=8fd51f4018813350a250c91c839ff1cb740556c1&lat=2025&mid=c1bdc8b60420a178de2d25b9e883baa16089e912>
(Registration
closes on 28 March 2025)

For further details, please refer to the attached flyer and schedule. If
you have any queries, feel free to contact us at
iksworkshops@aicte-india.org/iksoutreach@aicte-india.org
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=c73f0d9df21afa056222f2ce9b7a19d200238d38&lat=2025&mid=c1bdc8b60420a178de2d25b9e883baa16089e912>
or
call 011-29581005.

The poster and brochure are attached herewith.
We look forward to your participation.

from 09/03/2025 to 12/03/2025. Time and venue will be announced via Google

March 2025











Learning is better together 


Whether itâ€™s friends, classmates, or an online community, learning with others 
helps you stay accountable and motivated. And when a workplace or classroom 
develops new skills together, they become better communicators and 
problem-solvers, too. Read on to learn about some opportunities to get involved 
in the Codecademy community, bring advanced learning tools to your classroom, 
and more.

â€Œ


Happy learning, 

The Codecademy Team 







EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNTS 




 
<https://www.codecademy.com/pages/codecademy-discount-codes?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=codecademy_discounts_img>




Students and educators save year-round 


In school, or know someone who is? See how teachers and students can save on 
individual plans â€” or bring technical training and advanced admin tools to the 
classrom with 25% off Codecademy Teams.


Explore discounts 
<https://www.codecademy.com/pages/codecademy-discount-codes?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=codecademy_discounts_cta>






NEW COURSES 



 
<https://www.codecademy.com/learn/intro-to-quantum-computing?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=curriculum_quantum_computing_img>

Learn the fundamental principles of quantum computing, including the unique 
capabilities that distinguish it from classical computing.


Start course 
<https://www.codecademy.com/learn/intro-to-quantum-computing?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=curriculum_quantum_computing_cta>

 
<https://www.codecademy.com/learn/secure-coding-practices-in-java?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=curriculum_java_coding_practices_img>

Secure Coding Practices in Java 


Identify and mitigate common threats associated with deserialization 
vulnerabilities, improper error handling, and more.


Start course 
<https://www.codecademy.com/learn/secure-coding-practices-in-java?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=curriculum_java_coding_practices_cta>






UPCOMING EVENTS 






March 12 


AMA: Navigating the Full-Stack & Front-End Engineer Path with Bobby Velasco 
(exclusive event for Career Path learners)

Register now 
<https://community.codecademy.com/c/career-events-study-group/ask-me-anything-navigating-the-full-stack-front-end-engineer-path-with-bobby-velasco?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=community_events_ama_cta>

Register now 
<https://community.codecademy.com/c/events/code-mingle-speed-networking-for-codecademy-learners-5954b1?utm_source=iterable&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=march_2025_monthly_newsletter&utm_content=community_events_code_mingle_cta>

Join the Code Crew

content:
Dear Students,

Greetings for the day!!!

Interested one can apply.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head IT DEPSTAR CHARUSAT <hod.itds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Mar 4, 2025 at 10:34â€¯AM
Subject: Fwd: National Level Project Competition â€œTECHEXPO-2025â€ in hybrid
mode on 3rd April 2025(online Mode) and 4th April 2025 (Offline Mode).
To: DEPSTAR IT <depstar_it@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pratap Vikhe <pratap.vikhe@pravara.in>
Date: Tue, Mar 4, 2025 at 9:50â€¯AM
Subject: National Level Project Competition â€œTECHEXPO-2025â€ in hybrid mode
on 3rd April 2025(online Mode) and 4th April 2025 (Offline Mode).
To: Pratap Vikhe <pratap.vikhe@pravara.in>


Respected Sir/Madam,

Greetings of the Day!!

It gives us immense pleasure to announce a National Level Project
Competition â€œTECHEXPO-2025â€ in hybrid mode on 3rd April 2025(online Mode)
and 4th April   2025 (Offline Mode).  TECHEXPO-2025 is organized by the
student Chapter-International Society of Automation, Department of
Instrumentation & Control Engineering, Pravara Rural Engineering College,
Loni, and is sponsored by the International Society of Automation, Pune
section in association with the Institutionâ€™s Innovation Council (Ministry
of HRD initiative).The competition aims to encourage innovation and
creative problem-solving in the different engineering fields. We welcome
entries from individuals and teams.  The competition will be judged by a
panel of an expert in the respective fields. Cash prizes are as below:

Prizes: Category-I Engineering

First Prize: Rs 7000/-

 Second Prize: Rs.5000/-

Third Prize: Rs 3000/-

Category-II: Diploma

Rs: 3000/-

Rs: 2000/-

Rs: 1000/-

Please find an attached brochure for more detail. If you have any
questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We believe that this
competition presents an exciting opportunity to showcase your skills. We
look forward to your participation.

For more details, visit:

 https://www.pravaraengg.org.in/techexpo25.html

Link for Online Registration

https://forms.gle/J6qUb8aEgbuYHTpv9

-- 
Regards
__________________________________________________
*Dr. Pratap S. Vikhe M. Tech (Instrumentation) , Ph. D (Instrumentation)*
*FIETE, LMISTE, IAENG, IARA, IETE  *
*Member, BoS Instrumentation Engineering, SPPU, Pune*
*Associate Professor, **Department of Instrumentation and Control,*
*Pravara Rural Engineering College, Loni, **Tal:- Rahata Dist:- Ahmednagar*
*Pin:- 413 736, Mobile No: 09226 271070*

<https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Pratap_Vikhe>*
